column3: Eihon ngailutna atahbeh ipiham ti iheuve, ajeh chu Jesun eiho dinga ahinna chu ahung pehdohsa ahitai.
Kalchuh kut masangin Jesun hiche vannoiya kona apa henga ache ding phat ahung lhungtai, ti ahen, vannoiya um ama a ho chu angailun akhon nigeiyin angailu lhumkeiye.
Chule koiham kum somli jen Pathen lung hansah ho chu? Amaho chu chonsetbol mipite, atahsau long damsa gamthip'a kijamden ho chu hilou ham?
Hiti chun, Pathen thua nungte bangin hinkho mangun. Nalung ngaichat u suhbulhitna dingin masang nahin khouva chun kinungtol kit hih un. Chupet a chu aphajo ding nahet loulaiyu ahi.
Pathen in amichang cheh lungsetna achan theina dinguva ami changcheh chu seingai louva akhumchah ahitai.

Chule keiman Hinnanei–liho lah a aw-khat kajai, “Suhlouchang lhah pheng-khat ahilouleh sakol changlhah pheng thumchu nikhotha khat manjat hiding ahi. Chule Olive thao le lengpitwi chu mohmahthah sah hih in,” ati.
Pakai masanga kineosah un, chuteng Aman jabolna'a nadopsang dingu ahi.
Ajeh chu aman vannoi thu atan ding nikho atepsa ahin, thudih'a thutan ding mikhat apansah in, ama chu mijouse mudin thina a konin akai thouvin ahi,” ati.
Chuin sepai hon ling lukhuh apheh'un, Pakai chu akhuh peh tauvin ahi. Chuleh amahon ponsandup asilpeh un ahi.
Hijeh chun hitobang khangdong meithai hohi ajineikit uva cha aneidiu, inchen akisemdiu kaphatsah ahi. Chutileh melma chun amaho chu aseisetna diu agomkom aneilou diu ahi.
Keima Pa a kauma chule Pa jong keiya aume ti chu neitahsan jengun; ahilou jongle na kitong chengse jeh tah hin tahsanun.
Chuphat in thina le lhankhuh chu Tonsot meidil sunga chun alehlut tauve. Hiche Tonsot Meidil chu Thinina ahi.

Hichu ngaikhoh ahileh Christa chu vannoi kiphudoh a pat a avel vel'a hung thiding ahitai. Hinla tun, khang kichaikon lama hi chonset suhbeina dinga Amatah hung kilah a khatveiya a-itih a dinga kikatdoh a thia ahitai.
Gamthip noiya kum somli jen ahin puiyin,
Hitichun kasopite, nanghon Pakai Jan Anjon boldinga nakikhop ji tenguleh, khatle khat kingahtouvin.
Kelngoinou chun sinkhana gupna chu alhap kavet'a ahileh chua chun ling nasatah akihot'in ahi. Hiti chun nisa chu ponvom tobang'in athimin, chule Lha jong chu thisan tobang'in asantai.

Numei hon jong angailut hou chu athinauva konin ahingin akimu kit un ahi. Hinlah midang phabep chu gimbol hesoh athoh un, chamlhat ding deina a Pathen nungat anomdeh pouve. Amahon thokitna ahunglhun jouva hinkho phajo chu akineppiu ahi.

Ahivang in Paul in adonbut in, “Keini hi Rome mi kahi lhon in kholtoh louva mipi angsunga eivoh'u ahin, guhthima eisoldoh got'u chu hithei lou ding ahi. Hijeh chun amaho tah hungu henlang eisoldoh'u hen,” ati.

Ajehchu thupeh chun, “Nanghon jou sei hih un, nang hon tolthat hih un, nangho gucha hih un, nanghon mi nei thangset bol hih'un” ati ahi. Hichengse chule hitobang adangho chu hiche thupeh khat, “Nangma nakingailut bangin naheng nakom ngailun” ti hin akaigom soh'e.
Chule Ama hung ding kinem'a ngah jingho chu Ama athen banga amaho jouse jong thenga umding ahiuve.
Keiman Pathen Danthu kalung pumpin kabol nom'in ahi.
Pakaiya kipahtah in umjingun. Avel'in tikit inge–Kipahtah in umjingun.
Kakoma thusei chu koiham tia kakiheileh keiman sana-meivah khom sagi chu kamutai.
Chule Pathen in kihahselna aneipet a kacholngahna a lut louhel dingu ahi atia chu koiho koma thu aseiyem? Asei ngailou miho koma hilou ham?
Kamasanga hung masa ho jouse abon'uva gucha leh michom ahiuve, ahinlah ama ho thu chu kelngoihon angaipeh pouve.
Chule nangho sohho naputeu thuneina chu jana neitoh thon sanguvin. Amahon bol'un tia nahilu chu bolun-amaho chu mihepithem le lunggel toh them ahiseh-u hilouvin, mi engse ahiu jongleh bolun.
Chuin jouthu hettoh sahna asemun, “Hiche mipa hin Houin theng dounale Mose dan dounan thu aseiyin,
Chule hicheho jouse hi Christa jal'a Ama koma eilepuikit'u ahitah jeh in Pathena kona thilpeh ahije. Chule Pathen in miho chu Amatoh kichamna dinga ngansena eipeh u ahi.
Kasopi deitahte, thohhatna thudola avetsahpi dingin, Pakai mina thusei themgao ho veuvin.
Ahinlah koi hijongle Pakai min kou jouse sohcha ding ahi.
Amahon avahchoiyun, “Amen! Phattheina le loupina le chihna le thangvahna le jabolna le thaneina chule thahatna chu IPathen uva a-i-matih chanin hijinghen, Amen” tin asamuve.
Polam hoina khohsahnan sampheh a kijep hoi, thil mantam sana khi-o ahilouleh ponsil hoi hoa kijem ding gelkhoh hih un.

I-Pakaiyu chung thu midang seipeh ding jahcha hih beh-in, chuleh ama jeh a songkul katan jeh hin keima jong neijachatpi hih in. Pathen in napeh thahatna chu kengin lang hiche kipana thupha jeh a hi thohgimna toh dingin kigosan um'in.
Chule amaho jouse hi thutah'a suhthenga aum thei na dinguva amaho jal'a keima kisuthenga kahi. Jesun tahsan chate jouse dia taona anei
“Khangdoh in! Amohthem aumden ho suhat'in, ajeh chu amoh them umdenho jeng jong hi athikon cha ahitauve. Ijeh ham itileh nachonna ho hi Pathen mitmun thutah to akigamlat lheh jenge.
Chuin vantil thumna chun asumlheng chu vadung le twinah'a asunlhah'a ahileh, thisan asohgamtai.
Christa chun itahsan jaluva hiche ichan diuva kilomlou hamphatna chu tu idinmun uva hi eipuilut'u ahitai, chule eiho lungngam tah le kipah tah a Pathen loupina chu changkhom ding ihiuve.

Nahet chet diuva pha chu–jonthanhoi, thenlouna, ahilouleh michipse ho Christa le Pathen Lenggam lutlou ding ahiuve. Ajeh chu michipse kiti hi milim hou ahin, hiche vannoi thil hohi pathena anei ahitai.
Tahsan jal'in Abraham chu Pathen in a'in dalha dinga akouva chule gouva alodinga ateppehna gam'a che dinga akou chun thun ananung'e. Aman hoilama ache ding jong kihetlouvin anapotdoh jenge.
Lengpitwi don khamhih un, ajeh chu hichun nahinkhou amahthah sah ding ahi. Chusangin, Lhagao Thenga dimset un.
Amaho thuhil phalou le jachat umtah ajonthan hoinauhi mitampin ahinjui ding ahiuve. Chule hiche thuhil choiho jeh'a hi thutah lampi hi seiset a hung um ding ahi.
Tua hi eiho jouse hi Christan eibolpeh u ahitah jeh a, hiche Lhagao Theng vanga chu Pa henga ihungtheiyu ahitai.

Chidang namdang seijuite vang chu lekhathot a isei jouseu banga chon dingu ahi. Milim anga kikatdohsa an aneh lou dingu, thisan ahiloule hetlou sa aneh lou dingu, chule jonthanhoina a kona kikangse dingu ahi,” atiuve.
Chuin Peter chun aseiyin, “Ananias ipi dinga nalungthim chu Satan nalodimsah hitam? Lhagao Theng najoulhep in nasum akehkhat nanga dingin nakikoi tai.

Chutengleh eiho chapangho banga pilhing louva iumlou dingu ahitai. Eiho hi thuhil thah hui hung nung tobang ahung ho chun eimut lonle le lou dingu ahitai. Eiho hi mihon jouva eihin dohabol tenguleh thutah banga chingtheitah a asei dingu ahi.

Thildihlou bol ho chun Pathen Lenggam alo lou dingu ahi ti hi nahetdoh lou u ham? Nangho tah kingolbol hih uvin. Ahinlah jonlungpua chonsenom jing ho, ahilouleh pasal kijoh ho, ahilouleh pasal leh pasal jongho,
Chule eiho ikikhop khom dingu hi mi abang khattou anahsahmo umjongleh nahsahmo pouhite, hinla khat le khat tuhin, adehset in ahungna ding nikho anai ihet u ahitah jeh hin kitilkhou tou hite.
Hiti ahijeh chun, leiset chunga natibah chengu: jon lungput, thenlouna, huh lungput, lungdihlou ken, chule kiloset hichehohi milim houna ahin, abonchan thisah sohkeiyun.
Hinlah eiho lung limgeh in vah'a umu hitin, tahsan le ngailut lum panu hite, chule huhhingna lukhuh chu lungngam tah in kikhuh u hite.
Ajehchu Pathen in tijatna le meisanna Lhagao eipepouve, amavang thohhatna, ngailutna chule kitimthemna joh eipeuve.
Koiham khattouvin, Keiman Pathen kahei tihen Pathen Thupeh ho jui hih henlang hitaleh, amatah chu mijou ahin, chule thutah'a chu hinglouva ahi.
Chuti ahileh nanghon neikipasah tahbeh uvin, chuti chun lung pumpia thukhat kisauvin, khat in khat ngailu uvin, chule lunggel kithakhat neiyin chule doi kithakhat hiuvin.
Chuin vaipo hon ama chu mat ding agouvin, ahivangin ama phat alhin lou lai jeh in, koiman achunga khut alhapouve.
Asum u chu thilpha bolna a aman diuvin seipeh in. Thilpha bolna lama ninglhingu henlang alhasamho khotona hinneiyuhen. Chuleh midang koma phaldoh dingin phattin in kigosan umjing'u hen.
Hichun amahon adonbut'un, “Amapa khang-gilou ahilouleh nangma koma kahin lhut lou dingu ahi,” atiuve.

Nikho jatchom beh khat Pakai houna a mangho chun Ama jana a achutiman'u ahi. Ipipen anneh hijongleh nea chun Pakai jabolna'a aneh ahi, ajehchu amahon aneh masanguva Pathen athangvah-u ahitai. Chule abangloi khat chun anneh anehlou loi umsah unte; ahin amaho jong chun Pakai alunglhai nomjeh uva abol'u ahin, Pathen athangvah nau ahi.
Ama a ikinepnauva kipah thanom'un. Hahsatna a thoh hat-un, chule taojom jing'un.
Chuin sepai jalamkai pa koma chun, “Paul chu songkul'a koiyun lang ahin aloi agol hon avila angaichat ho abolpeh thei nading un phalna peuvin,” ati.
Ngailutna hi amoh lunglhadai jipoi, atahsanna alhadai jipoi, aphat tinin akinem jin, chule itobang hahsatna hijongleh athohjouve.
Hinlah keihon tuni geiya thu kaseiphongu hi tahsanna Lasunpan anaphondohsa, “Keiman Pathen katahsanin, hiti chun thu kaseiye,” ati tobang kaneiyu ahi.
Sopite ho, kahin ngehnau chu mithase ho chu gihsal un. Akichaseho tilkhouvun. Atha lhasam ho phaten khohsah in vesuiyun. Amitakip chunga thoh hat'un.
Chuin vantil nga na chun asumlheng chu laltouna a tou sahem chunga chun asunglhan ahileh, alenggam chu muthim sunga aluttai. Amite chun lunghemin aha-u ageltauvin ahi.
Pathena cham-lungmonna le khotona chu hiche Pathen mithahte chena lhongpi jui'a jop
Ama chun Pakai lampi thu ahil in, chule midang ho chu dihtah le Lhagaova thaneitah in Jesu thudol ahil in ahi. Ahinlah ama chun twilutsah John bou ahet ahi.
Hijeh chun nanghon naneh u hihen nadon'u hijongleh, ahilouleh ipi nabol'u hijongleh, abonchan Pathen loupina dingin bol'un.

Hinlah nanghon Lhagao Theng naneiyuve chule Ama nangho sunga achenge chule ipi chu thutah ham tithua koiman nahil dingu ngaikhoh ahitapoi. Ajeh chu Lhagao chun imalam jousea nahil dingu ahi, chule Aman ahil chu thutah ahi, Ama ah jou apangpoi. Hiti chun aman nahilsau bang chun, Christa to kiloikhomna nei jingun.
Haitheina hu aumlouleh tahsa phatchomna aumlou tobanga hi, thilpha bolna natoh ho beiya tahsan chu athi ahibouve.
Chuin changlhah phabep alan Pathen athangvah in aheh balbal'in anetan ahi.
Chusang chun, milim doi anga kikatdoh sa anneh, jon thanhoina, hetphah lou saneh, le thisan neh a konin kikang seuvin, tin jih thou hite.
Ahin Paul in, “Phatlouna a dim miphalhem pa! Pathen in nangma nabeh ding ahi, itobang thutan mi nahiya nangman dan napal keh a chutobang a eibeng dinga mi thu napeh ham?” ati.
Hitichun, tun Christa Jesua hiho (tahsa thua chonlou lhagaova chonho) dingin themmo channa ding aumtapoi.
Ajeh iham itileh Pathen in eiho chunga alunghanna abuhlhah khum ding hijolouva, I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa jal'a huhhingna chang dinga eilhendoh joh u ahi.

Ama chitin namtin ho lhemlha dinga kipatdoh ding, Gog le Magog kitia chu leiset kolkimvel'a akhopkhom ding ahi. Aman amaho chu galsatna a dinga akhopkhom ding, galmi hattah, twikhanglen panga simjoulou neldi jat hiding ahi.
Nangho lah a phabep hitobang chu nanahiuve. Hinla tua hi nangho angima nahi tauvin, athenga kisem nahi tauvin, Pakai Jesu Christa min pan'a chule Lhagao Theng jal'a Pathen to kilunglhaiya nahi tauve.

Hichejeh-a chu, keiman hiche songkul'a hi kathohgim ahi. Ahinlah keima kajah achapoi, ajeh chu keiman katahsan chu kahechenin chuleh ama ahungkit kah-a achunga kakingap lhahna dungjuiya hi eikaihoi jing ding ahi ti katahsanin ahi.
Lhagaovin phat bihnei jousea le thilsoh jousea tao jingun. Limgehchan umjingun chule muntina mithengte ho jouse dingin nataonauva pangdet jingun.

Hiche lekhathot hi Paul, Silas chule Timothy a kon ahi. Keihon Pa Pathen le Pakai Jesu Christa a hiho Thessalonica Houbung mite henga kahin thot nahiuve. Pathen chun lungset le cham-lungmon napeu hen.
Amitakip in naum nauva nabol jouseuva lunggel toh them nahiu hehen. Pakai hungloi tading ahi geldoh un.
Ajehchu nanghon hiche changlhah hi naneh chanseuva chule hiche khon'a hi nadonlai chanseuva nanghon Pakai thina chu ahung kahsea naphondoh u ahi.
Hitobanga tahsan neitah a taona chun ana chu adamsah a, chule Pakaiyin nadamsah dingu ahi. Chule nanghon chonsetna chu nana bolu ahileh ngaidam chang ding nahiuve.
Timothy, kapu kapaten apom banga selepha hetna lunggel thengtah puma kapom Pathen chu nang jal'in kathangvah e. Asun ajan in kataona a nangma kageldoh jinge.
Chule amaho chun molchung le songpi ho chunga konchun ahinsamdoh un, “Kachunguva hunglhuvin chule Laltouna a toupa le Kelngoinou masanga lunghanna a konin neisel un.

Koi hileh Houbung ho henga Lhagao thusei angaina ding nakol neiyin chule hetkhenna neichan chun ngaihen. Koi koihileh jona neichan chu vana kiselgu manna chu kapeh ding ahi. Chule keiman khatchang cheh a songkangkhat kapeh ding ahi, chule song chunga chu akisanpa tailou, koima dangin ahettheilou minthah kijihdoh ding ahi.

Ama ho chu achipset nauva chingtheitah a jou aseiyuva nasumu chu ahin kisip tup dingu ahi. Hinlah Pathen in amaho chu masangpeh a themmo achansau ahin, chule amah thahna dingu chu kho ngaisot lou helding ahi.
Hitia chu Pathen in amaho chu hatah a lheplhahna a achuhsah ding, chule hiche jouthuho chu amahon atahsan dingu ahi.
Pathen thun asei, “Nangho jeh in chidang namdang hon Pathen min ataitomuve,” kiti hi datmo hih un.
Jannes le Jambres tenin Mose adoudal lhon bang chun amaho hin thutah chu adoudalun ahi. Amahohin lungthim chavai aneiyun tahsan lhem achepiuvin ahi.
Keiman kangailut chan kasuhdih jia chule kathunun ji ahi. Hiti chun gunchun chule nalunggel dihlouva konin hung kihei kit'in.
Chuti ahijeh chun, Pathen mitmua tahsan jal'a kisudih ihi tah jeh uvin, Pakai Jesu Christa thilbol dohsa jal'a chu Pathen to kicham'a ihitauve.
Nathuhil dungjui chun kimangchan, hichu chepi jingin chutileh Pathen in phatthei naboh ding chuleh nathuhil jahojong phatthei chang diu ahi.
Phat atam jon houthu dol a akikhop nau in tina jong talent kamat sah jin, Jesu atahsan nau taitom sah in hoise tah in kana douvin, gamdang miho khopi dung gei in kana nocheh jin ahi.
Nangho nachonset lung ngaichat thua nanun tenguleh, hichea kon chun: kingaichat tona lama chonhoilou, thenlouna, lungguh a chonset nopsah ngaichatna,
Koichu aphut'a panga, ahilouleh atwichap koiham ti chu akhohjo dehpoi. Akhohjopen chu Pathen akhansahpa chu ahi.
Nanghon tua lhagao thilpeh tintang nangaichat hou chu I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa hungkitna ding kinem'a ngah a nahi jeh uva naneiyu ahitai.
Chule keiman vana kon twikhanglen kinong gin tobang leuva hugin ahilouleh van-gin kitol tobang chu kajan ahi. Hiche gin umdan chu selangdah tampi kitumging tobang leuvin ahung kithongdoh in ahi.
Ama tahsan ho jouse Amin jal a achonset nau kingaidam ding ahi tia themgao ho jousen ahettoh sah-u chu ama chu ahi,” ati.
Aman thilpha bol'a pontho a lungdehat ho, chule loupina le jabolna chule thithei louna Pathen in agonpeh holjing ho, chu tonsot hinna apeh ding ahi.
Hiche lekhathot hi John a kona Asia gam'a houbung sagi ho henga ding ahi. Auma, aum jingsa chule ahung umnalai ding; Laltouna maiya Lhagao sagi;
Chuin Paul in, “John baptize chan chu chonset na a kon lunghei na ding bou ahi, ahin John jeng in jong miho jah a chun ama jouva hung ding pachu tahsanun,” ati, hichu Jesu aseina ahi.
Hijeh chun nangman namui, Pakaiyin Ama ngaisah ho chu thoh hasatna atonauva kona iti ahuhdoh ding ahen, Aman migilou chu hahsat thutanna nunung nikho lhinkah jenga jong gimbolna munah akoiye ahenai.
Hinlah amaho hin mun phajo agaldot'u ahi, hichu van gam ahi. Hijeh a chu Pathen chu a aPathen'u tia kikou ding jahchalou ahi, ijeh ham itileh amaho ding khopi khat asem ahi.
Amavang Pathen deilou gollui thusimho le thuchavai ki houlimna hoa konin kidalsen lang Pathen dei hinkhoa kipuikhangna ah kipelutjon.

Chuin keiman amaho chu leiset phaicham pheng pumpi hop'a akaltou-u kamun, chule Pathen mite le khopi theng chu ahin umkimvel tauve. Hinlah vana konin mei ahung lenglhan mi nokhum galmiho chunga achun chule amaho chu ahalvamtai.
Chuin aman Jesu Christa mina baptize chang dingin amaho chu thu apetan, chujouvin Cornelius in amaho henga nikho phabep um ding'in alhotan ahi.
Nangma mitcho lamhil'a panga chule muthim lah a lamvaiho khomusah dinga kigel'a nahi.
Chule hiche kiloikhomna ithanop nau hi aman eithutep peh u Tonsot Hinna chu ahi.

Hinlah, chunga kona chihna hi amasapen a atheng ahi. Chujongleh chamna ngaichatna, phat jousea lungneng, chule midang thua jong nung nom tina ahi. Khotona dimset le thilpha bolna asodoh in ahi. Koima lama langkaina aneipon chule lungdih pun aum jinge.
Pa chun Achapa angailun, chule ima jouse ama khut'a apetai.

Mi phabep in Pakai chu athutep lam dol a geisang hidinga agel u chu hilou ahi. Ahipoi, ama nangho jal a thoh hat joh'ah ahibouve. Aman koimacha suhmanga aum ding adeipoi, chusanga mitin lung akisih dingu adei ahi.
Hinlah amichang cheh hi kei tobang'in achangin umcheh leu kati. Hinla amichang cheh hi Pathena kon thilpeh changcheh a ahin, khat ahilouleh achom changa ahiuve.
Ngailut hi nalungtup sangpen'u hihen. Hintin Lhagao thilpeh thilboltheina aphadehset chu-adehset'a Pathen Thuseidoh theina lhagao thilpeh chu nalunga nangaichat'u hihen.
Ajeh iham itileh Pathen in, “Muthim lah a vah umhen” tia asei chun hiche vahchun ilungsungu asalvahtai, hichu eihon Pathen loupina chu Jesu Christa maiya kona imudoh uva ihettheina dingu ahi.
Alang khat'ah Egypt gam Alexandria a konin thusei them tah le Pathen Lekhabu thu hetah Judah mi Apollos chu Ephesus ahung lhung in,
Hitobangma a jong chu Jesu chun khopi kotpi polama chu gim athoh a chule thia athisan'a amite athensah ahi.
Nangman hichengse hi nahil'a chule tahsan chate chun abol diuva natilkhou ding ahi. Angaikhoh dungjuiya nangman amaho suhdih na tha nanei ahi, hijeh chun koimacha nathusei nahsahmo bolsah hihhel in.
Pathen in ichan geiya eingailut'u hitam ti eivetsahnau chu Achapa chang khatseh chu vannoiya hi ahinsol ahitai, hitia chu Ama jal a eihon tonsot hinna ineitheina dingu ahi.
Hepa nangman neipeh loupina chu nangin neipeh ho hin amuthei na dingun, keima umna'a chun kakoma amaho jong umleu kati ahi; chule vannoi bul kiphu masanga nangman neingailut ahijeh chun.
Mahthahna le lunggimnan ajui jinguve.
Hiti chun eihon Thempu chungnung, Pathen Chapa Jesu, van mun galut ah, chu ineiyu ahitah jeh in, Ama itahsanu hi kolchah jingu hite.
Pa Pathena kona jana le loupina Aman anamu ahitai. Pathen loupi thaneinaa aw chun ajah a, “Hiche hi keiman kangailut tah, kipana sangtah eipea ka Chapa ahi,” ati.
Hiche Lhagao Theng chu khat ahin, lhagao thilpeh jouse hompa chu ahiye. Amabouvin itobang lhagao thilpeh chu koi chang ding ham tichu khat cheh dinga agellhuh ahi.

Chujouvin vantil-lina chun asumkon chu amut in ahileh Nisa chu hop-thum'a hop-khat, Lha chu hop-thum'a hop-khat, chule Ahsi ho jong hop-thum'a hop-khat chengse chu abonun athimtai. Chule nikho jong chu hop-thum'a hop-khat athimtan ahi. Chule jan jong hop-thum'a hop-khat chu athimtai.
Chuin kikhopna in'a lamkai Sosthenes chu mipi chun amanun, thutanna inmai laitah a chun avotauvin ahi. Ahin Gallio chun iman jong agelpeh pouve.
Chuin avel'in amahon Jesu chu matding ago kit'un, ahi. Ahivangin ama hiche mun'a kon chun apotdoh in amaho chu adalhatai.
Hiti chu ahijeh'in keiho kalhadah hih heluve. Katahsau hin thina lam chu hinnai jeng jongleh, kalhagaovu hi anitinin ahalcheh cheh in ahi.
Chuin Mary in halpi bei Bego thao namtui man tamtah chu ahin choiyin Jesu kengphanga anun asamin atheh ngimin ahileh agimnam chun insung chu alosoh jeng in ahi.

Chule Pathen in ateppeh gam alhun jengin jong tahsan jal'in chua chun achengin ahi-ijeh ham itileh ama gampam mi bangin ponbuh in achengin ahi. Chule Isaac le Jacob thutep chang gel teni jong hitima chun aumlhon e.
Sopi deitah teho, keima umchan tobang hin nangho jong um uvin, chule keimaho nung juiya pangho um chana konin kihil uvin.
Khat'in khat pohgih poh huvin, hiti chun Christa danthu chu subulhit un.
Chutichun, eihon ithilbol jeh uva Pathen anga midih hina chu ichan theiyu ahin, tahsan jengseh a kon ahipoi, ti imudoh tauve.
Chuti ahileh, eihon Pathen chu athilbol adihpoi itiuvem? Ahideh poi!
Tahsanna'a lhasam midang tahsan chanpi khat chu sanguvin, chule alunggel dih hen, dih hih jongleh kinelpi hih un.
Chuphat in Van mun'a gal ahung umtai. Michael le avantil ten dragon le ama vantilte chu asattauvin ahi.
Chule chonset sodohna lunghan chun nathunun datauhen. Nalunghan pet pum in nisa kilhumkhum sah hih un.

Setna chu asen lethuh hih un. Mihon najumso tenguleh jumso kitna ding lunggel hih un. Hisang chun phattheiboh jouvin. Hichu Pathen in nabol dinga nakouna chu ahi, chule Aman hiche jal a chu phatthei naboh ding ahi.
Chuleh keima eisolpa chun ei umpi jinge, aman kachangin eidalha poi, ajeh chu keiman phat jousen ama lunglhai na bou kabol jin ahi,” ati.
Nadin nauva chun pang det un, thutah konggah in kigah un, chule tipum chu Pathen chonphatna galvon in kivonun.
Hiche hi kakhut jetlam'a nangman namu ahsi sagi ho le thaomeikhom sagi ho chu ahi. Ahsi sagi ho chu houbung sagi lhacha ho ahin, chule thaomeikhom sagi ho chu houbung sagi ho ahiuve,” ati.

Eihon imupenu chu Jesu, vantil ho sanga panmun neojep akikoi chu ahin, chule Aman eiho dinga thina ahungthoh ahi tah jeh in, Ama hi tun “loupina lallukhuh khuhpehna le jabolna achangtan ahi.” Ahi, Pathen lungset in, Jesun mitin dingin thina chu ahung tepkha tan ahi.
Ajeh chu Pathen nasung uva natonga chun Alunglhaina tohdohna dinga ngaichatna le tohdoh theina tha napeuhen.
Kakipana nangho a aum jingna ding le naki panau acham kimna dinga thu hicheng hi najah uva kana sei ahi.
Hiche lekhathot hi Christa Jesu solchah, Pathen eihuhhingpu'u thupeh le kinepna eipeuvah Christa Jesu pansah, Paul, a kon ahi.

Chuleh numei hohi adolbep chan kijemu henlang kiphalam khenchan umuhen. Akivondiu bepchan kivon u henlang, asampheh danuvah chingtheiyuhen, sana le dangka mantam ahilouleh thilman lutah kivona kilelahna neidauhen.

Hichun Jesun khao phabep ahol'in, kijepna asem in, amaho jouse chu Houin a konin adeldoh tan ahi, chule aman bong le kelngoi ho chu anomangin, sum lhengho dokhang alekhup peh in, sum ho athethang peh in;
Ajeh iham itileh eiho Pathen khutsoh ihiuve. Aman eiho Christa Jesua athah a eisemu hi, Aman masanga pat a eiho dinga atohgon thilphaho chu iboldoh theina dingu ahi.
Gol ngaitah teho, nanghon patepna meikou banga hahsa nathoh u chu, thil nahet khahlou helu nato'u tobang'in datmo hih un.

Eiho kipah-uhitin, chule thanopna neiyuhite, chule Ama jabolna peuhite. Ajeh chu aphat, Kelngoinou moupui golvah ankong umkhomna ding chu phat hunglhunga ahitai, chule Aji dingnu jong kigosademin aumtai.
Huhhingna chu lukhuh in neiyun, chule Lhagao chemjam Pathen Thu chu panun.
Egypt mipa khat'in Israel mikhat alamlou tah'a abol chu amun chuin Mose chu ahungin Israel mipa chu ahuh in Egypt mipa chu athattan ahi.
Sopi deitahte, nangho lah a adangse dinga kasei chu, thilpha bolnaa chimhihbeh uvin.
Kihong phauvin, Tahsanna'a chun dingdet'un, Lung ngam'un. Hat'un.
Ahipoi, nanghon Molech ponbuh le pathen Rephan ahsi hou dinga alim nasemthu-u chu napole ji bouvui, hijeh a chu nangho Babylon gamsung chana soh-a kasol ding nahiuve,” ati.
Hiche ho jouse gel pumin, sopi deitahte, keihon nangho tahsa a kaumpi pet u hihenlang ahilouleh lekhathot a kon hijongleh nangho dingdet'un lang chule kathuhilu chu kolchah jinguvin.
Pathen Amatah in hiche hi eiho dinga agon ahin, chule hiche photchetna a chu aLhagao Theng eipeh u ahi.
Numeihon kangkhencha leh ginggeh cha a um kithemchuh uhen.
Houbung lhacha khat chunga hehna aumleh hettohsah mini, mithum aumlouleh lahih in.
Christian kingailutna a khat le khat kichibaiyun. Christa Houbung ho jousen chibai nahin boluve.

Chutia amaho kap diu chule alunghemnau vetsahna a aluchunguva vutvai atheuva, chule hung pengdoh jeng diu, “Chuche khopi lenchungnung dinga itobang tah a tijat um hitam! Konglen neiho chu ahaona thil ho twikhanglen'a polea apanjeh uva hung haodoh uva ahin, tun mitphet kahlouvin amahthah jenge,” atiuvin ahi.

Veuvin, Van'a um IPauvin ichan geiya eingailut'u hitam? Ajeh chu Aman Achate tin eikou tauve–chule eiho jong ihi tahbeh u ahi! Hinlah hiche hi vannoiya hihon Pathen Chate ihiu hi ahephapouve, ajeh chu amahon Ama ahetlou jeh u ahi.

Hitobangma chun, nangho khangdong hon jong Upa vaihom ho thuneina chu noppeh un. Chule nangho nabonchauvin, khat in khat kineosah pumin jenun, ajeh chu “Pathen in akiletsah chu adouvin, akineosah mi vang chu alung lhaina ahi.”

Chuti thei ponte, amichang cheh jousei hijeng jongleu, Pathen adih-e, Pathen lekhabun ama chung chang thua, “Nangma na-thuseija chu nadihna photchetna umding, chule thutanna mun'a jong najo ding ahi” ati.
chule hoilai mun hijong le nangma min kouho jouse amat a songkul'a akhum thei nadinga thempu pipuihon thaneina apeh'u ahitai,” ati.

Hinlah Israel lah a jong themgao dihlouho ana um tobanga chu nangho lah a jong thuhil dihlou hung um ding ahiuve. Amaho chun chingthei tah a mahthahna thei thuhil phalou ahil dingu chule aPakaiyu amaho chodohpa geiya ahinseilep nahlai dingu ahi. Hitiahi, amaho tah in phulou helouva amah thahna dingu ahin kilhut dingu ahi.
Hiche jeh tah chun, Judah vaipo hon Jesu thana ding aha hol cheh tauvin ahi, ajehchu aman Cholngah nikho apalkeh keo hilouvin, Pathen chu apa ahisah a chuleh Pathen toh kibanga aumjeh chu ahi.
Nanghon nalunguvah keima neigel jingun, chule nahenguva kathuhilu thu chu najuiyuve, ti kahet hin keima kakipah lheh in ahi.
Leng David in Ama thudol aseiyin, “Keiman Pakai chu kamaikoh-a kamu jinge; keima kalonle louding ahi ajeh chu kajetlama ama aum jinge.
Ajeh chu nangho penthahna hi abeiloi ding tuhinkhoa ahipoi. Hinna thah naneiyu hi aitih a umjing ding ahi, ajeh chu hichu Pathen Thuhing jing tonsot'a um jinga kon ahi.
Na dam theina dingun nachonset'u khat in khat koma phong unlang, chule khat chu khat dingin taovun. Michonpha lung gutten'a ataona chun thaneina lentah aneiyin chule kidangtah ahinbol doh e.
Keiman nangho tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahiuve, koi hileh ama tahsan chan chun tonsot hinna anei ahitai.
Chule keiman nangho avetup ding beiyin nadalha pouvinge; keima nahenguva hung kit ding kahi.
Henge, aphatchomna ho atam'e. Amasapen'in, Pathen thu kiphongdoh hi aboncha Judah mite kinganseuva ahi.
Soh ho, leiset a napakai teu phatah a jabolna le ginna neipumin athu uva nungun. Nanghon Christa najen ding bangtah u chun jen un.

Nangman Pathen itobang tah a nachunga lungset them, thohhat le lung dehat hiya ham tihi hedoh louva nahim? Hichehi, ima hilouva nagel nahlai ham? Nangman hitobang lungsetna hi nachonset lung khelna ding ahi, ti mudoh loulai nahim?
Chule Aman ipi hijongleh alunglhaina hoa ithum chanu chu eingaipeh uve ti tahsanna ineiyuve.

Keima kataona hi nangho Ama natahsan jal uva, Kinepna Bulpi Pathen chun, kipana le cham-lungmonna kimkeiya nadip dimna dingu hi ahi. Chutengleh nangho Lhagaotheng thahatna jal'a kinepna neiya lung ngamnan nalung'u alodim theina ding kati ahi.
Chuleh thingpel'a aki khetbeh nau mun'a chu hon khat uma ahin, hon a chu koima kivuina khahlou hel lhan thah khat uma ahi.

Chuin sahem chu amantauve, chule amatoh chun themgaolhem, sahem thalhenga thil kidangtah tah bolpa–hiche thilkidang chu sahem melchihna kilah ho le alim houho jouse lheplhahna a kimang chu ahi. Chuin Sahem le athemgao lhempa chu anilhonin mei-al lenglung meikou sunga chun alehlut tauve.
Chusangin, “Namelmateu chu agil akelleh vahva set-un, amaho adang'u achah leh adon ding peuvin. Hitia chu naboluva ahileh alujanguva mei-am setkhompeh nahi dingu ahi.”
Christa thu chu chihna jouse tothon nasung uva cheng dimset hen; khat le khat tumgingtoh tholan houlan, chule lhagaolan kihilun chule kitilkhou touvin, nalung gil un Pakai choi-atnan lasauvin.
Pateho, najinu teu ngailu uvin chule amaho chunga lunghimona neihih un.

Tahsancha numei khat chun sopi meithai aneiya ahileh amaho chu phatah-in kivetsui henlang mopohna houbung chunga ngapdahen. Chutileh houbungin achangseh'a cheng meithaiho phatah-a avetsuithei dingu ahi.
Chule Pathen in ahettohsahna chu hiche hi ahi: Aman tonsot hinna eipetauve, chule hiche Hinna chu Achapa koma uma ahi.
Koi koi hileh Chapa neiya chun Hinna anei ahitai. Koi koi hijongleh Pathen Chapa neilou chun Hinna aneilou ahi.
Hijeh chun, Chapa chun nangho nalha-ong'uva ahileh nangho achamlhat tahbeh nahiu ahitai.
Hijeh chun, hiche munakeima chungthu kikholnaho jehhin lunglha hihbeh un. Nangho jeh a keiman kagimthoh hi nanghon sahtah nahiu kihet un.
Hitobang miho chu Christa lhacha natong hilouva amaho lung deiya natong ahiuve. Thusei them le kam ngeiyin dohan themmona neilou ho alhemlhauvin ahi.
Ahinkho man'u chu, gitlouna tincheng, chonset, kiloset, mithetbol, milop, mitha, kidou-kinah, kiduhabol, dou lungput, chule kiseiset abol'ui.
I-sunguva chengah Lhagao Theng thaneina a kon chun nangman nakingansena thutah manlutah chu chingthei tah in kichin tup in.

Achonsetnau lungngaichat suhbulhitna dinga hing ho chun hiche chonsetnomna chonna a chu akemmang theile thina chu aki-atdiu ahi. Hinlah Lhagao lunglhaina a hing ho chun Lhagaova kona tonsot hinna a aki-at dingu ahi.
Ahilou jongleh Christa chu patep pouhite, amaho lah a phabep in achutibol uvin chule gul in achulih uvin ahi.
ahilouleh a-engsepoi. Amadei deibou angeh gunsetpoi. Lunghimo pina aneipon, chule akibolphat louna ho aching denpoi.
Amahon galvon akivonu chu thih a kisem ahi chule alhavingu hugin chu sakol kangtalai chunga touva galsatna mun del galmi tobang ahiuve.
Keiman kana seidoh lou hile amaho hi themmo chang pouvinte. Ahinla tun amahon achonset nau jeh chun thuphat bolthei pouvinte.
Tahsan neilouho lah a chun chingtheitah in hinkho mangun, chule phat kijenpet chu phatchompi penun.
Eihoa um ihinau milui chonsetna chu Christa to khetbeh tha ihitah jeh uva, chonset in ihinkho uva tha aneina chu lahmanga um ding ahi.
Hitichun, tun koiho hi Pathen chate hiuva chule koiho chu Diabol chate hiuvem ti iseithei tauve. Koi hileh chonphatna a hinglouho chule midang tahsan chankhompi ngailulou ho chu Pathena ahipouve.
Ajehchu chonsetna lungthim hin Pathen adou jinge. Hichu Pathen Danthu toh kikal ahi, chule juijong ajuilou ding ahi.
Hijeh chun kalung akipah-in, chule kalei athanome; chuche kalval chun katahsa jong kinem'a cholnga ding ahi;
Ahipoi, hichu ahi naisaipoi. Hiche avetsahna thil kitoh ho hi lhagao boh ho koma kibol'a ahin, Pathena kikatdoh ahipoi. Chule nangho lhagao boh hotoh najao kop dingu kanompoi.
Antioch Houbung sunga Themgao le mihil ho chu, Barnabas, Simeon (mivompa), Lucius (Cyrene mi), Manaen (Herod Antipas golpa), chule Saul ahiuve.
Hiche chonset hoa kithemchan ho dohan lhahih hel un, ajeh chu Pathen lunghan chu Ama seingailou ho jouse chunga chuding ahi.
Amaho chu suhthip ding ahiuve, ajeh chu athuhil dihlou uva kon chun insung tamtah apuimangun ahi. Chule hiche athilbol u chu sum ngailut jeh a bou abolu ahi.
Ijeh inem itile ama matsah a pang dingpa chu aman ahetsa ahin, hiche jeh a chu aman, “Nabonchauvin na ngim pouve,” ati ahi.
Keiman nangho atahbeh kaseipeh nahiuve, koi hileh kelngoi hongkot'a lut louva bang'a kal'a hunglut chu gucha michom ahi.
Amaho lamdih a kona pampet'a ahitauvin, chule Beor chapa Balaam, thilse bola sumlo nompa khonung juiya ahiuve.
Chuin chidang namdang mitam tah le Judah techun alamkai tehou toh kithon songa se-a delkhum ding lung angaito tauvin ahi.

Jesun athumvei nan adongkit in, “John chapa Simon, keima hi nei ngailut tahbeh mong hinam?” ati. Thumveijen, “Neingailut'em?” atijeh chun Peter chu alungthim anommo lhehtan, ahin Peter in adonbut'in, “Pakai nangman ijakai nahe sohkeiye, keiman nangma kangailut na jouse nangman nahenai,” ati. Hichun Jesun ajah'a, “Kakelngoi ho vah'in” ati.
Chuche mun'a chu imacha aphalouva, jachat umtah milim houna le lungthen louna ho imacha luttalou ding, Kelngoinou Hinna Lekhabua kisunho chengse bou chu lutding ahi.

Numeinu chun ponsandup le asanthip akisilin chule ahoiya hoi, sana le khisong mantam chule twikohchanga akijem in ahi. Amanu hin sana a kisem jukhon, jamo thu kisun dimset chule ajonthanhoiya athenlounaho chu akhut'a akichoiyin ahi.
Hicheng jouse chunga hin ngailutna chu kivonun, hichu kikankhomna phachamkim pen ahi.
Jesun adonbut in, “Mihem Chapa choiat'a aum ding phat ahung lhunge.
Nangman jonbol adihpoi natia, hinla nangman jon nabol em? Nangman milim hou themmo nachan'a, hinla nangman milim houna kon'a kigudoh thil ho namanchah em?
Hinlah, chonset in hiche thupeh amangchan keiya neipap kilosetna lung ngaichat jouse chu atildoh in ahi. Dan chu umlou ahileh, hiche tha chu aneilou lai ahi.
Chule kasol na chidang namdang te lah le nanam mite lah a kon a kahuh doh jing ding nahi,

Eihojong, khatvei chu, lungthimbei le seingailou inahiu ahi. Eiho lamdihlou lama puilonlea inaum uva chule tahsa lungngaichat le nomsahna tamtah soh a inaum'u ahi. Ihinkhou chu gitlouna le kithangsetto naa dima, chule khatle khat kihotoa ina umu ahi.
Pathen leh Jesu Christa chuleh vantil sangpen ho mitmua hiche thuhi kapeh nahi, hiche thupeh hohi langnei naleh sihneina koimacha koma neilouvin mangchan.
Hijeh hin hiche Pakaiya nakingainau na-ngaplhah u tahsanna hi paidoh hih un. Hichea hin tohman nasan dingu lentah aume.
Hichea avetup a ngansena chang michu tahsan umtah mi ahi angaiye.
Chule Peter chu Joppa muna savun sem Simon in'ah nisottah aum dentan ahi.
Nangho nabonchauva kigoma Pathen hou-in nahiuva chule Pathen Lhagao chu nanghoa chenga ahi chu helou nahiuvem?
Chule hitia chu sopi deitahte, van mun thengpen a chu Jesu thisan jal'a eiho iluttheiyu ahitai.
Chujouvin Jesun avel in ajah'uva, “Keima kache mang ding ahi, nangho kache na-a nahung thei pouve, ajeh chu na chonset nau chu nathipi ding'u ahi,” ati.
Hiche jeh chun Pathen lhenchom mithengte deiumtah angailut namthenga lhendoh nahitah jeh uvin–mikhotona lunggel, mihepi, kineosah, nunnemna lungthim, thohhatna in kivonun.
Koi hijongle kalhacha a panga chun kanung eijuihen, keima umna'a chu kalha cha jong um ding ahi; mi koi hile kalhacha a panga chu Pa chun ajabol ding ahi.”
A-insung kipohtupjou mi, achaten ajathei le athua nunsah joumi hiding ahi.
Hitichun nabol ngaisau tobang chun, khat le khat kitil khou touvinlang chule kisadohton khat le khat umun.
Hiche hi atil abula pat a nana jahsau chu ahi: Eiho khatle khat ikingailut dingu hi ahi.
Tupet hahsatna jal'a hi, nahina banguva naum dingu phapen in kagel'e.
Pharisee mi amin Nicodemus kiti Judah teho'u lamkai khat aum e.
Rahab notinu chu vetsahna chom khat ahi. Amanu hi athilbol jal'a Pathen anga midih hina chu chang theiya ahi, ajeh chu aman gam velhi teni chu asel a chule lampi chom lama bitkei cha asoldoh jeh ahi.
Ahinlah numeiho hi tahsannale ngailutna'a, thenna le chonnema aum jingleh achahin uva kona huhhing'a umding ahiuve.

Hiche Israel nampi Pathen chun ipu ipateu ana lhengdoh in Egypt gam'a chun apunsah uvin chule thahattah nampi khat in ahin semdoh tan ahi. Chuin athahat nan Egypt mite khut ah asoh chan nauva konin ahin huh doh in,”
Pathen in mihem lungthim ahen, eiho eipeh bang uva chidang namdang te jong Lhagao Theng apeh hin Pathen san ahi nau ahettoh sah ahi.
Ajeh chu Pathen, “Jon bol hih in,” tipa mama chun, “Tolthat hih in,” jong ati ahi. Hitia chu nangman mi natha a, jon nabollou chu hijongleh nangman dan chu napalkeh ahitai.
Keiman amaho chu tonsot hinna kapen, chuleh amaho chu itih'a jong mangthah lou ding ahiuve. Chuleh koiman keiya kon'a amaho chu eilahpeh lou ding ahi.
Pathen'a kon cham-lungmonna chun: Satan hi nakengto noiyuva akoivah ding ahitai. I Pakaiyu Jesu milungsetna chun naumpiu hen!
Amaho chu hougut hiuvintin, ahinlah amahon Pathen thaneinale athilbol theina ajahnomlou diu ahi. Hitobang hoa kon hin kikangsen,
Hitobangma chun Christa tipum jong chutima ahi. Eiho tipum khat chung'a tibah tampi ihiu ahin, chule eiho ibonchauva khat cheh hi khat tibah ihiu ahi.

Hichehi tahsan umtaha kisei ahi, chule nangman hiche thuhil hi hatah a nadopsang ding kadeiye chutia chu Pathen tahsan ho chun thilpha bolding agelkhoh nadingun. Hiche thuhil hohi pha a chule mijouse dinga phachomtah ahi.
Hitichun Pathen Thubun asei dung jui in, “Abraham'in Pathen atahsanin, Pathen in atahsan jal in chonpha tin ama chu asim tan ahi.” Ama chu Pathen golpa tinjong akikouve.
Kasopi deitahte, loupitah IPakaiyu Jesu Christa tahsanna neiya nakiseiyuva iti dana nanghon khohsah tum naneitheiyu hintem?
Thumanlou aseiyun, lhankhuh kihong namse tobang ahiuvin ahi. Aleigui-u jouseinan adimset-un, anephu noijuva kon'in gulsegu ahung valhai.
Hitobangma chu, jipa tehon jong ajinuteu chu atahsau banga angailut dingu ahi. Ajehchu mihem khat ajinu ngailua chun amatah kingailua ahi ti avetsah e.
Hicheho jouse hi ipi kiseina hintem? Chidang namdang te Pathen chondan juilou ahivangun, amaho chu Pathen lungtoh dia kisema ahitauve. Chule tahsan hin hiche hi ahin hitheisah ahi.
Tahsan thugil tua kiphongdoh thudol'a kipeh theng nanei, chule lungthengsel a hing mi hidiu ahi.

Chuleh apakai teu chu tahsan chate anahi khah jongleh sopi ahijeh chun nahsahmon boldau hen, chusang chun hajencheh joh uhen, ajeh chu anatoh-u phatchompi hochu angailut u tahsan chate mama ahiuve. Timothy, hiche thuhi hilin, anitchehna diuvin tilkhouvin.
Ahinai, amaho phabep tahsan thejin aumpouve, hinla amaho tahsan theija aumlou nauva Pathen chu tahsan umlou kisohthei ahisah ham?
Hitia aum vang chun sepai ho khat in Jesu nah chu tengcha a asut le apet pet chun thisan le twisih ahung pot tan ahi.
Hiche hi keima thupeh ahi, “Keiman nangho kangailut bangin, nangho jong khat le khat kingailu tocheh in um'un.

Natibah chengu chu hoipen hijongleh chonset bolnaa man dingin pedoh hihbeh-un. Chusang'in, Pathen ah kipe thengun, ajehchu nangho athisa nahiuvin, hinla tun hinna naneitauve. Hijehchun, natahsa pumpiu chu Pathen loupina dingin adihlam bolna in manguvin.
Hinlah eiho hi manthahna dinga kihei mangho ihipouve. Eiho tahsan umtah ho, alhagao huhhing'a umding ho ihiuve.
Chule hitia chu Israel jouse huhhing hidiu ahi. Pathen lekhabun aseiye, “Jerusalem'a kona huhhing dingpa chu hung ding ahi, chule aman Israel mite chu Pathen ngaisah louna'a kona alehei ding ahi.

Ajeh chu Juda ho lah a phabep chun themgao ho anathat un, chule phabep chun Pakai Jesu jeng jong chu athau anahi. Tun amahon keiho jeng jong eibol hesoh uve. Ama hon Pathen alunglhai pouvin chule mi jouse to kikala natong ahiuve.
Ngaitahteho, eihon thutah hetna inei nunguvin henasan chonset bolleu hen, hiche chonsetna ho khukhumna ding longlhenna chu umkit talouva ahitai.
Ajeh iham itileh Aman eiho thinaa konin Christa to eikaithou tha tauvin, chule Amatoh vanmunhoa eitousah tauve, ajeh chu eiho Christa Jesu to hingkhoma ihitauve.
Hijeh chun jousei pailha tauvin. I-heng le ikom ho henga thutah chu seitau hite, ajeh chu eiho jouse hi tipum khat a chu jaova ihisoh keiyuve.
Hinlah amaho khut noiya kipehlutna chomkhat jengcha jong kanei man pouve. Keihon kipana thupha thutah chu nangho dingin huhbit kanomun ahi.
Hitia chu paochomchom thoa chun akiseidoh ho chu ledohtheina dinga jong taoding ahi.
Ahin Saul vang chu Pakai nungjuiho gihsal le that dingin ahai hai nalaiyin, hijeh chun thempu chungnung henga achen,
Chuleh tua keima nangma koma hunga kahitai, chule keima leiya kaum laiya chu kipa thanopnaa adim jing thei na dinguva kana seipeh sohhel ahitai.

Chusangin hapan kipah jouvin–ijeh inem itileh nanghon Christan athoh gimna a chu chan neikhoma nahiuve, hitia chu Aloupina kipana kidangtah chu vannoi pumpia akiphondoh tengleh nanghon namuva nanei dingu ahi.
Chuin keiman hiche lekha pheng lentah tobang sung chu kaven ahileh leiset chunga umsa akengli hole gamsa chule aop a kithol le chunga leng vacha kamun,
Hinlah tuhin: lunghan, lungsat miduhabol, Pathen taitom, thuthanghoi seina kam, hichengho hi pailhauvin.
Paul chu amaho in'ah alhung in na atong khom jiuvin ahi ajeh chu ama banga pon-in sah them cheh ahiuvin ahi.
Hijehchun, natahsau thithei chunga hin tahsa lung ngaichat lam'a chonna dingin chonset vaihomsah hih hel'un
Keihon hitobang miho chu thu kapeuvin, chule Pakai Jesu Christa minin amaho chu kangeh uve, amaho chun ageltoh uva chule akihinsona diuva na atoh diu hi ahi.
Chuin hiche puluiho chu asopipau Joseph chunga ana thangthip uvin, hijeh chun Egypt gam'a sohding in anajohdoh uvin ahi. Ahin Pathen in anaumpi jingin,

Amaho lah'a Agabus atiu themgaopa chu kikhop khomna khat'a ading doh in lhagaovin Rome gamsung pumpia kel nasatah hunglhung ding ahi tin aphondoh sah tan ahi (Hiche gaothu hi Claudius vaipoh laiyin aguilhung in ahi).
Chuin thu asei jouvin adilsun amaho toh ataokhomun ahi.
Christa Jesua hiho dingin tahsa lungtup hole chonset lung ngaichat ho chu Athingpela akhetbeh tha ahitai.
Sopi deitahteho, nangho hahsatna hon nahinphah tenguleh, hichu hachangpa kipana dinga chanpha changin kingaitouvin.
Hijeh achu eihon Pathen to kiloikhom kahi itiuva ahia lhagao muthim lah a vahle nalai ihiuleh eiho thutah chu jui jing lou ihiu ahi.
Chuin vankot akihona lekha pheng lentah tobang khat aning lia ahung kikhai lhah amun,
Eiho hila Parthia mi, Mede mi, Elam mi ihiuvin, abang Mesopotamia gam'a cheng, Judah gam le Cappadocia gam'a cheng, Pontus gam'a le Asia gam'a cheng,
Hichea chu nahinkho mandan u Pakai jabolna le lunglhaina ahijinga, chule nahinkhou chun gapha asodohna dinga, chule Pathen hetna a nakhantou becheh cheh theina dingu hi ahiye.
Kachapa Timothy, nachunga gaothua anakiseiya kon a hiche thuhil hi kapeh nahi. Hiche hin Pakaiya dinga nagalsatna-a nahatsah ding ahi.
Hichengjou chun, vana mipi atam'a tam awgin tobang kisamging chun, “Pakai chu vahchoiyun, Huhhingna le loupina chule thahat-thilbol theina chu IPathen uva ahi.
Nangho khatvei chu nasei ngailounau le nachonset nau tamtah jeh a athia nahi tauve.
Nanghon Pakai khon'a le lhagaobohho khon'a chu nadon theidehlou dingu ahi. Pakai dokhang le lhagaoboh dokhanga nanehkop theidehlou dingu ahi.
Nalah uva jon-thanhoina, thenlouna, ahilouleh chipset umdahen. Hitobang chonsetnaho hin Pathen mite lah a mun aneipoi.
Alung theng dinga imajouse thengsoh kei ahi, ahinlah akisuboh atahsanlouho ding vanga athenga khatcha umlou ahi, ajeh chu alunggel ule selepha hetna alungsungu bohji a ahi.

Chuin athu lhangsap japha jousen kidang asauvin, “Hichepa hi Jerusalema Jesu seijuiho suhmang ding gopa chu hilou ham?” atiuvin ahi. Chule “Hikoma hi seijuiho man dingle kanchoma thempu ho henga kaidinga hung hilou ham?” atiuvin ahi
Hinlah tun Jesu, IThempu Chungnungu hi thempu natoh lui sanga gamchenga chungnungjo tohding nei ahitah jal jeh hin, thutep phajohoa Pathen to kitepna phajo eiho dinga palai hiya ahi.
Ajehchu keima dinga hin kiti hi Christa dinga hin ahin, chule thi chu aphajo cheh ahi.
Chule keiman nanghoa natohpha tongpan ah Pathen chun Christa Jesu ahungkit nikho lhin masangsea Anatoh chu ajoma abulhit teiding ahi ti katahsan akichenin ahi.

Chule Pathen Chapa chu ana hunga chule hetkhen themna chu eihungpeh u ahitai-chutia chu eihon Pathen dihtah chu ihettheiyu ahi ti iheuve. Chule tua hi eiho Pathen dihtah toh ihinkhom theiyu ahitai, ajeh chu eiho Achapa Jesu Christa toh kiloikhom ihitauve. Ama chu Pathen dihtah le Tonsot Hinna ahi.
Nabol jouseu chu amichang cheh to kichamna dingin bol'un.
Eihon kinepna iphotchet u hi lunglinglau louhel in kolchah kheh u hite, ijeh ham itileh Pathen hi akitepna a tahsan umtah ahije.
Lungmon kada lhah peh nahiuve; kalungmon kapeh nahiuve; kapeh hi vannoi mi peh bang ahipoi; nalungu donsah hih-un, kicha jong kicha hih-un.
Hitichun keiho hiche tahsa a kahinlai sunguva hi Pakai to in'a umkhom'a kahipouve ti kahetnau hi kisonpi khopset theiya hetna nei kahiu ahi.
Mikhat touvin kathu jahen nit hih jongle athu katanpoi; ijeh inem itile keima vannoi thutan'a hung kahipoi, vannoi huhhing ding joh a hung kahibouve.
Eiho Cain tobanga agilouva ihipouve, ama chun asopipa anatha ahi: Ipi jeh a atha hintem? Ajeh chu Cain chun aphalou abola chule asopipa chun chonphat abol jeh ahi.
Chule twikol ho jouse jong aum gamtapon, chule molho jouse jong akisucham sohtai.
Chuti chun nampumpi khat chu athisa tobang mikhat a kon mi atama tam, vana ahsi ho jat le twikhanglen panga neldijat, hung hidoh ahiuve, asimje jong umlou ahiuve.
Loupina le jangaina jouse atonsot atonsot in Pathen a hijing tahen! Amahi tonsot leng, mutheilou, thitheilou, amabouhi hiche Pathen chu ahi, Amen.
“Pathen gingun, Amaa loupina peuvin. Ijeh ham itileh Aman thu atanna ding phat hunglhunga ahitai. Vanho le leiset, twikhanglen le twinah ho jouse sempa chu Hou un,” tin asamin ahi.

Ahin aniseh a atahsan akibejing phat in alah uva phun noina le kilunglhaito louna aumdoh tan, hichun Greek pao tho atahsanho chun Hebrew pao tho atahsanhon niseh-a neh le chah kihopna-a meithaiho akhohsah pouve tin aphunnoi tauvin ahi.
Ajeh chu Pathen in Christan nangho dinga gimbol hesoh athoh banga chu gimthohna ding hijongleh thilpha boldinga nakouvu ahi. Ama navettoh uva najui dingu chule akhonung najui dingu ahiye.
Keihon nangho kaumpi pet jenguva jong, hiche thupeh hi kapeh u nahi, “Natong nomlou hon nehding kimulou ding ahiuve,” tihi.
Ajeh chu Pathen in hibanga hi vannoi angailut ahin, koi hijongleh Ama tahsan chan chu mangthah louva tonsot hinna anei na dingin, aneisun achapa changkhat chu apetan ahi.
Ahin chutia nikhat abolgot kit laitah un lhagao boh chun, “Jesu le Paul chu kahenai, nang koi nahiuvem?” atin ahi.
Chuphat in keiman sahem le vannoi lengho chule asepaiteu chu sakol chunga toupa le galmanchah choite ho chu douding in akikhop khom-u kamun ahi.

Chule Macedonia mi Thessalonica a kona Aristarchus jaonan, Asia gamsung sah-lhumlam a Adramyttium kong ngahmuna konin konga kache tauvin ahi. Chule hiche kong chu Asia gamsung muntina kingapa dinga kigong ahi.

Songkul'a nangho tah aumsa bangin kigelun lang, songkul'a umho chu geldoh un. Nanghon natahsauva gimbol natna amahon athoh u nangho tah in nathoh sau ahi tobang'in, alamlouva kibolho jong chu geldoh un.
Chule thua hihen, natoh a hita jongleh, nabol jouseu chu Pakai Jesu minin bolun lang, Ama jal'in Pa le Pathen chu thangvah un.
Pathen Thu kihil ho chun ahil hou dinga, amaho tochun thilpha achankhompi ding agonpeh dingu adoltah ahi.

Ahinlah Pathen in akengto ngapna dingkham gambeh neocha jong ana pepoi. Ahin Abraham'in chapa aneiloulai vang'in nikhatle ama le ason achilhah ten hichegam hi alodingu ahi tin Pathen in ana thutep-in ahi.
Hiche lengpa chun imiteu chu doha in abolin asugentheiyin chule achasen houchu athi nadingin anu le apa teu chu hunam'in ana paidoh sah in ahi.
Hiche jehchun Peter le seijui khatpa chu lhan khuh lam jon in ache lhontai.
Hiche jeh a hi mijouse le Pathen anga dih tah a hinkho manding kagot jing ahi.

Amaho hi twikhanglen kinong husetah tobang, jachat umtah athilsebol'u twiphon kinotkhom banga umho ahiuve. Amahohi ahsi-somleng tobang ahiuvin, tonsot'a themmo changa muthim lhangkhal kihehlah a dinga gotsa ahiuve.
Keiman kathupohle hi mihem a kon ahipon, koiman eihil ahipoi. Chusanga, keiman Jesu Christan kahenga aphondoh hoa kona bou kamu ahiye.

Eiho milui ihinau chun ei-thunun laiseuva chonset lung ngaichat in eiho chung'a na atoh ahi. Chule Dan hin hiche thil phalou ngaichatna chu ahin kondohsah a, hichun chonset ahin jia, thina asodoh ji ahi.
Chule hiche tahsan thu leh thutah thuhi chidang namdangte lah-a hilchen ding leh seiphong dinga keima hi solchah-a eikilhengdoh ahitai. Keiman kaseivalpoi thutah bou kasei ahi.
Pathen Thupeh ho nit a juiho chu: Amatoh kiloikhom ahiuvin, chule Ama jong amahoa chu uma ahi. Chule eihon eihoa Ama aume ti iheuve, ajeh chu Aman Lhagao eipeh u chu isunguva achengin ahi.
Nangma dingseh a phatna ding chu gelkhoh hih in, hinla midang phatna ding gelkhoh un.
Khat le khat kitoh del'in cheng khomun. Milham hotoh kiloikhomna neina dinga kiletsah hoitho bolhih un. Chule ijakai hesoh keiyin kigel hih un.
Lungdam louna jouse, lungsat, lunghan, thungeilou sei, chule seiset oimona, chule chonchan phalou jouse chu paimang un.
Pathen in Ahoubung lhacha kinbol dinga eingansea Athupoh chu poa nangho henga phongdoh dinga hunga kahi.
Alu le asam chu samul tobang ahin, buhbang ban'in abangin ahi. Chule amit teni chu meikong toh abangin ahi.
Hichengho jouse hi nangho phatchomna ding ahi. Chule Pathen lungsetna mitampi chunga alhuncheh cheh tobanga hi thangvahna loupitah, chule Pathen chu loupina chang cheh cheh ding ahi.
Hijeh chun koi hileh kasa ne'a chuleh kathisan don'a chu keima sunga ama aum'in chuleh ama sunga keima ka um'in ahi.
Marthan adonbut'in, “Henge, Pakai Pathen katahsan'e, nangma hi Pathen Chapa Messiah vannoiya hung dinga chu nahi,” ati.
Tahsan chate jouse chun solchah ho thuhil jong, kiloikhomna jong, neh leh chah kihopkhomna le Pakai anjon a jong, taokhomna a jong gunchu tah in anapang det jingun ahi.
Nangman thutandih nadeijin, chule aphalou nahotbol e. Hijeh a chu vo Pathen, na Pathen in thaonanua, kipana thao chu midang chung sanga nachunga asunlhah ahitai,” ati.
Chuti chun John sopipa solchah Jacob chu chemjamin ana thattan ahi.
Pathen nahsah louna thu phachomlou ngolkai thu kihoulimna'a konin kikangse in,
Koi hileh sopi michom khat hotbola chu alung sunga tolthat ahitai chule tolthat ho chun asunguva Tonsot Hinna aneipouve.

Jing-an anehjou phat'un, Jesun Simon Peter adongin, “John chapa Simon nangman hiche ho jouse sanga hi nei ngailut joh em? ati. Peter in adonbut in, henge Pakai keiman kangailut nangman nahe nai,” ati.
Lhagao chun mikhat a thumop themna apeh ahin, hiche Lhagaoma chun michom khat chu thu hetkhen themna apen ahi.
Anivei channa a anache uchun Joseph chu a sopite henga ana kiphongin chuin asopite chu Pharaoh henga anapuilut in ahi.

Ajehchu, Pathen Thubun asei chu, “Nangman hinkho chu nakipapia, nikho kipa um tampi namu noma ahileh, naleigui chu thilse seinaa konin kihuh tup in, thilpha bolin chule namuh chu jou seina a konin kikangsen.
Chuin Tahsan chate jouse chu lungkhat le thakhat ahiuvin, koiman jong anei chu keiya tum ahi tilouvin, anei jouseu abonchan aneikhomun ahi.
Keiman nahenguva akhohpen tah keima henga anakipe chu kahinpehson nahiuve–Christa chu Pathen Thubun asei dung juiyin ichonset jal'un athin ahi.
Nalamlen lhongpiu ho'ah themgaoho le Pathen mithengte thisan alongin, chule miho kithana thisan chu vannoi muntin'a alonglhan ahi.
Chuin chidang namdang ten hiche thu ajah phat un hapan akipah in Pakai athangvah un chule tonsot hina chang dinga kilhengdoh ho jouse chu seijui in apang tauvin ahi.
Hicheho jouse chunga tahsan umtah hettohsah'a panga chun aseiyin, “Henge, Keima hungvah ding kahi!” ati. Amen! Hungin, Pakai Jesu!
Nanghon keiya kon a nakihilsa hou, nasansa ho-u chule keima a kon a najahsa hou le namusahou nitin in juiyun. Chuteng cham-lungmon Pathen chun naumpi dingu ahi.
Amaho chu melma ho gelin gel hih un, hinla sopi nabolna bangun sosalun.
Mihem lunggel leh hiche vannoi lhagao thuneihoa hungkon chihgut lekhathemna le doha lheplhah a na-umlouna dingun chingtheiyun, hichu Christa a kon ahipoi.
Keiman kilhaitetna chu achaina geiya lhailhunga chule Pathen in Christa Jesua eikounau van kipaman sanna ding mun chu hadel'a del kahi.
Aman chonsetna jousea kon eisoptheng diu, i-onthol nadiu, chule ama mitea eisem uva napha tong dinga apumpia kiphaltheng ihina ding uva ahinkho manbeiya eipeh u ahi.

Keiman atahbeh chu nangho kaseipeh nahiuve, kathusei ngaiya chuleh eisolpa Pathen tahsan'a chun tonsot hinna anei ahitai; amaho chu a itih'a chonset themmo channa geita louva thina akon'a hinna galkai ahitauve.
Vantil kahenga thuseiya chun khopi le akelkot ho, chule abang chu tena ding in akhut'ah sana a kisem thiltena mollhon achoiyin ahi.
Amaho chun mahthahna lam amanouve. Amaho atumpiu chu a pathenu ahi, akithangatnau chu jachat akimuna diu, amaho chun tuhinkhoa dingbou agelu ahi.
Houbung Upa ding chu tahsanthah hilou ding ahi, ajeh chu hung kiletsah intin Diabolin asuhlhuh ding ahi.

Ngaitahteho, keiman nangho henga eiho jousen chan ineikhom'u huhhingna thudol hi kahinjih got ahi. Hinlah tun keiman achom dang khat, Pathen in amithengte henga khatveiya apehdoh tahsanna a pandet ding thujoh hi jihlouva phamo dan in kagel tai.
Peter le John in Jesu vanga thokitna aume tithu ahil lhon jeh chun hiche lamkai ho chu alung phamo lheh jengun ahi.
Ajeh chu amanu chonsetna ho chu van sang in asangin, chule Pathen in amanu thilse bolho chu ageldoh in ahi.
Aman Galilee gamsung ajot'in twisih lengpi twi asosah na Cana kho'a chun ache kit'in ahi, chuche kho koma Capernaum kho'a chun vaipo milal khat a um'in, achapa chu ha dammo lheh jeng ahi.
Thase hihbeh un, ahin natoh ponthouvin chule Pakai kinbol chu thanopnan neiyun.
Ama namu khah louvang uvin nangailu uve. Tuhin Ama namu loulai vanguvin, Ama natahsan tauve; chule nangho kipana loupitah phondoh theihoi hilou chun nakipah tauve.
Chule Pathen in a Lhagao eipeh u hi eiho Ama a ihingun chule Ama eihoa aume, ti photchenna ahi.
Chuleh chukoma chu belkhat'a theitwi thuh kitung ahin, chule twichop phon a theitwi thuh dimset in hyssop mol leh'a atah-un akamtoh asutouvin ahi.
Ajeh chu Amahin muthim lenggama kona eihuhdoh uva chule Alungset Chapa Lenggam mia eisemu ahitai.
Chule tun keiman kangehbe nomu chu, ka sopi deitah teho, kibung khenna le miho tahsan lhahdaisah nangho thu nakihilu akaleh a hilhoa kon'in kichih theiyun. Amahoa kon chun kikangseuvin.
Lhagao thilpeh nachan chu midang kithopina dinga ahileh, phatah in kithopinan bol'in. Nangma mihil'a napanleh, phatah in hil'in.
Hiche teng chule nanghon keima imacha neidoh'u jong ngaita ponte, thutah chu ahile, Pa henga nathum jengthei'u ahitai; ajeh chu keima mina nathum jeh uva na ngaichat hou chu suhbulhit a um ding ahi.
Khopi kulpi bang chu khombul songa songmantam som le nia kisem ahin, khatna Jasper ahin, ani na Sapphire, athum na agate, ali na emerald,
Geldohun, nanghon nabol dingu chu ipi ahi henasa'a nabol lou u chu chonset ahi.
Chule laltouna a kon chun aw khat in, “I Pathen-u chu Asohte jousen, Ama ging jousen, aneopena pat alenpen geiyin, vahchoiyun,” atiuve.
Tupet itahsauva hin ithachol jiuvin, chule vonthah kivon ding tobang'in vanvou chu ingaichauvin ahi.
Nanatoh chu chingthei tah in bolin, ajeh iham itileh phatah a naboljeh a nalungna kim ding ahi, chule hichea chu na natohna chunga koimadang to nakitekah angaipoi.
Hinlah pasal khat'in numei khat kichenpi dinga akiteppia alamlouva bola akigela chule atahsa lung ngaichat'in athujobeh tah a ahileh, aman agon bangin kichenpi jenghen. Hichu chonset ahipoi.
Chuleh phat hung lhung ding ahi, kikhopna in'a kona nahin kaidoh dingu, chutengle koi hileh nathat uva pang hon athil bol'u chu Pathen'a dinga napha tonga kingaito dingu ahi.
Chutah in keiman datmo umtah thilsoh kidang khat vana kamun ahi. Vantil sagi ho chun gamna hoise achaina sagi ho chu akhut uva achoiyun, hichun Pathen lunghanna chu asuhbulhit ding ahi.
Hichun Jesun adonbut'in, “Keiman kasei khel aumle neimu sah'un, ahinla thutah kasei doh jeh'a chu ibol'a neivoh uham?” ati.

Chule nangma katohkhompi dihtah (Sizigas) nangman hiche numei teni hi kithopin, ajeh chu amani hi midang kipana thupha seiphong pehnaa gunchutah a pang lhon'ah ahi. Amani hi Clement to chule Hinna Lekhabua amin kisun dang hoto tongkhoma ahiuve.
Amahon namithengte le na themgao ho thisan asotah jeh uvin, nangman amaho chandinga kilom'a nagel thisan chu dondinga napeh ahitai” ati.
Chuti thei ponte. Eiho chonsetna'a thisaho chu iti dan'a chuti bep'a chu ihinjom nahlai dingu ham?
Sahem asanthip anaumsa, ahia umjom talou chu leng aget channa ahi. Amahi sahem sagi tobangma ahin, chule ama jong mahthah nalam manoa ahi.
Hinlah Pathen Thubun hiche thuahi ipi asei em? “Sohnu le acha chu nodoh tha tan, ajeh iham itileh soh numei cha chun ongtholnu cha chuto goulokhom theiponte” ati.
Ahinlah ahaodoh nom loihohi lhepna ah alhajiuve chuleh ngolhoitah le hamset umtah ngaichat hohin manthahna-a alehlutji bep in ahi.
Sahem asanthip le aki som ho chun abonchauvin Notinu chu athetbol tauve. Amahon amanu hi sagoh keova alha diu, asa aneh diu, chule atibah aneh mohchengseu chu meiya ahalvam diu ahi.
Hinlah Pathen ngailu mi chu Pathen in ahetpeh mi hi ahi.

Chuti ahileh eiho Juda mite hi midang ho sangin iphajouve tia thulhuhna ibol dingu hitam? Chuti theiponte, ajehchu eihon mijouse, Judah mi hihen chidang namdang mi hijongleh, chonset thaneina noiya uma ihi tauve, tia iphondoh-u ahitai.
Chuin bongnou toh kilou milim khat asem uvin, hiche milim henga chun kilhaina gantha asemuvin, athilsem uchu akipapi uvin ahi.

Hinlah hiche gamna hisea thilouho chu athilse bolnauva konin alungu aheideh pouvin chule Pathen lam asang dehpouve. Amahon thilhaho le sana a, dangkaa, hah a, songa chule thinga milim kisemho–milim semthu kho mutheilou, kho jatheilou, chatloh theilou ho chu ahoujom jinguvin ahi.

Ajehchu keihon Pakaiya kamopohnau hetkhen themna kaneijeh uvin, keihon midang ho thujona teidinga hatah a kiseh a kahiuve. Keiho kitah tah'a tonggima ka hiu Pathen in ahen chule nanghon jong nahet'u kakinemun ahi. Pathen toh kicham'un

Eiho jouse hitia chu ihin jiu anahin, tahsaa ilungtup hou le ichonsetnau lung ngaichat ho chu juiya inahiu ahi. Eiho ihinau ngaiya chu midang dang ho tobanga eiho jong Pathen lunghanna noiya uma inahitauve.
Chule Peter in thutampi asei jomjing nalaiyin, amaho chu atilkhouvin, “Hiche khang gilou mite-a kon hin kihuhdoh un,” atin ahi.
Ajehchu chonset thua nanun le nathi teiding ahi. Hinlah Lhagao Theng thahatna jal'a nachonset lungngaichat chu natha vangleh nahin ding ahi.
Pathen lekhabun eiseipeh-u dungjuiyin, “Koi hijongleh ama tahsan chan chu jachatna a chulou ding ahi” ati.
Keiman nangho jouse henga kasei masah nom chu, keiman Ka Pathen chu Jesu Christa jal'in kathangvah-e, ajehchu Ama natahsanu thu chu vannoi mun jousea kisei ahitai.
Kasopi deitahte, Pathen in nangailu uvin chule Pathen in Amite hidingin nalhengdoh tauve, ti kaheuve.
Athupi penin, khat le khat kingailutna nangho khat in khat chunga neiyuvin, ajeh chu ngailut hin chonset tamtah akhun ahi.
Chuin aphat ahung lhun phat in Italy cheding in konga katou tauvin ahi. Paul le songkul atan khompi mi phabep chu Rome sepai lamkai holah a Julius atiu khut'a chun apedoh tauvin ahi.

Chule amaho chun, Pathen sohpa Mose la le Kelngoinou la chu asauvin: “Vo Hatchungnung Pakai Pathen, nathilbol ho akidangin chule Aloupi lhehjenge. Vo namtin Lengpa, nalamlhah ho dihtah le kitah tah ahi.
Naosen sohthah ho bangin, lhagao bongnoi thengsel chu ngaichauvin chutileh lhagao huhhingna a chu na kikhanlhit thei dingu ahi.

Chule keiman vana kon in aw khat in hitia asei kajai, “Hiche hi jihdoh in: Tua pat'a Pakaiya thiho anunnomui. Ahiye, tin Lhagaovin aseiye, amaho anunnom monga ahiuve, ijeh inem itileh amaho anatoh gimnauva kon'a kicholdoa ahitauvin; athilpha boluvin anung-u ajuiye.”
Pa Pathen mitmua hou thengsel le adihtah chu–meithai ho chule nuneilou le pa neilou ho alunglhah nauva gakhotoa chule vannoiyin nasuhboh ding na jahnom lou chu hiya ahi.
Hiche kaseipeh uhi koimachan doha pana nangho mohthua na lheplhah louna dingu ahi.

Chuin keiman vana le leichunga chule leinoiya le twikhanglen'a hinna nei jousen vahchoila asah u kajan, “Phattheina le jabolna chule loupina chule thilbolthei thahatna chu Laltouna a toupa chung'ah chule Kelngoinou chung ah atonsot tonsot'in umhen” atiuve.
Chujouvin vantil nina in asum kon amut'in ahileh, meikou mol lentah tobang chu twikhanglen'a akilehlut tai. Hiti chun twikhanglen'a twi chu hop-thum'a hop-khat thisan akisohtai.
Khopi pamlanga akaidoh-un songin asep-un, chuin ama themmo chansah hochun avon chu asut-un Saul kiti khangdongpa kengbul'a chun akoiyun ahi.
Chukit jongleh, “Chidang namdang nanghon nabon chauvin Pakai chu vahchoiyun. Nangho vannoi mite jousen Ama vahchoiyun.”
Ajehchu imajouse hi Ama'a kona hunga chule ijakai hi Ama thahatna'a uma, chule hichu ama loupina dinga gon ahije. Loupina jouse tonsot'in Ama a hijing hen! Amen.
Ajingin John in amaheng lam'a Jesu ahung amun, “Veuvin vannoi chonset pomang Pathen kelngoinou khu,”
Tahsan jal'in notinu Rahab chu ama chenna khopi mite Pathen sei ngailou ho tochun amantha tapoi. Ijeh ham itileh aman gamvelhi ho chu phatechan analamdot in ahi.
Guchapa hunglo na chu agu mang ding leh asumang ding bou ahi, keima vang amahon ninglhin na leh lunglhai na hinkho aneina dinguva hunga kahi.
Ahinlah eiho Pakai Jesu Christa chenna van-gam mite ihiuve. Chule eiho huhhingpu ahungkitna ding chu kinem'a ngah jinga ihiuve.
Hiti ahijeh chun, Pathen loupina pehtheina dingin Christan nangho nasan banguvin, nangho jong khatle khat kisangtouvin.

Amaho toh hin lhon inlang Houin a gakisutheng unlang, chonna dan dungjuiya sam avo nadingun seipeh in, chutile mihon athujah jouseu hi alhem ahin, chule nangma tah jeng in jong Judate dan ajuinai ti hi ahetdoh dingu ahi.
Chule Abraham hi cheptan ho dinga jong lhagaova apau ahi. Hinla hiche hi Abraham cheptan masanga tahsan anei tobanga tahsan neihoa ding bou ahi.
Chuin amahon vang asangun ahileh Matthias chu solchah somlekhat holah a akisimtha tan ahi. Solchah ho Lhagao Thenga adimu
“O seingailou ahinauva kingaidama, achonset-u mukit loudia kisuhbeipeh ho chu iti kipa um hitam!
Hiche themgao teni hi Olive thing teni chu ahin, vannoi pumpi Pakai masanga dinga thaomeikhom teni chu ahi.
Nathilbol chunguva kisihna mitlhi longdoh hen. Lungkhamna le lunghemna tahbeh soh hen. Nuina sangin kana, chule kipana sangin lhasetna sohhen.

Golngaitah, hichepa vettoh thei ahilou hin nangma nalung lutsah hih hen. Aphabou chu juiyin. Thilphabol ho chun Pathen chate ahiu aphotchennau ahin, chule thilsebol ho chun Pathen ahet lou u ahi ti Thutah'in hettoh sahna aneibouvin ahi.

Cheptan hi Abraham'in tahsan aneiye ti amelchihna ahi. Chule Pathen in ama chu michonpha tia asan'a chule aphondohna chu cheptan masangpeh ahitai. Hijeh'a hi, Abraham hi cheptanlou atahsanho dinga apau ahi. Atahsan nau jeh a chu amaho michonpha tia kisima ahitauve.
Ajehchu eiho Christa toh ithiuva chu chonset thaneina noija kon eichamlhatsah-u ahitai.
Katahsau hin kagimthoh nauvah Jesu thina a chan kanei jingun, hichu katahsauva Jesua hinna chu akimudoh na ding katiu ahi.
Midangho hin ama ama phattouna ding kigelkhoh'ah ahiuvin Jesu Christa lam thu chu agelkhoh pouve.
Tahsan jal'in Sarah jeng jong chu aching'ah ahia chule atehlheh tah vang chun cha aneitheiye. Amanu hin Pathen in akitepna asuhbulhit ding ahi ti atahsanin ahi.
Chuleh Pathen lunglam chu hiche ahi, Aman keima eipeh chengse hi khatcha mansah louva, ni nunung nileh amaho kakai thou ding ahi.

Hinlah eihon Pachu Pathen khatseh, ijakai sempa ahin, chule eiho Ama dinga hinga ihiuve ti iheuve. Chule Pakai khatseh bou Jesu Christa chu ahin, Ama jal'a Pathen in ijakai asema chule Ama jal'a eiho hinna eipeh u ahi.

Hinlah tun Timothy ahung lhungin, nangho tahsan le ngailut thu ahung lhuttai. Amahin keihon kahung vilnau thudol chu kipahtah in nageldoh jingun chule keihon nangho kamunom tobangun nanghon jong neimu nomuve ti thulhut aneiye.
Chule Kelngoi ching pipu ahung kilah teng chuleh, nanghon aitih a abeitih umlou loupina le jabolna Lallukhuh chu nachan dingu ahi.
Hiche lampi thah chu eiho eikipeuva ahitah leh eiho hatah a lungngam ding ihitauve.

Hiche thuhil dihlou ho hi lung geltohlou gamsa tobang ahiuvin, alungphut dung jui uva chon, ahing chang uva mat'a chule suhmang theibep dia penga ahiuve. Amahon ahetlouvu aseiseuvin, chule ganhingho banga kisumang ding ahiuve.
Aman hiche ati chu vaicha genthei khohsah a asei ahipoi, ama chu gucha ahin, chule sumdip avop ahin, asunga kikoi chu akilahji ahi.

Eihon Pathen in ichan geiya eingailut u hitam ti iheuve chule eihon Angailutna tahsanna chu ineitauve. Pathen hi ngailut ahi chule ngailutnaa hing jouse chu Pathena hinga chule Pathen asunguva uma ahi.
Alangkhat ah Stephen thijouva seijuiho kibol gentheina jeh a jamcheh ho chu Phoenicia, Cyprus le Syria gam'a Antioch changeiyin ajamun, chule Judah te henga bou Pathen thu alhangsamun ahi.
Ahinlah Pathen ngaisahnatoh kilhon'a lungnachim hinkho hi haona tahbeh ahi.
Chule sahem chu Pathen mithengte kisatpi dinga, chule amaho chu jou dinga phalna kipea ahi. Ama chu phungtin le miho le pao chule nam jouse chunga thuneina kipea ahi.
Ahinai, thilse boljeh a nathoh hatnau chun ima chanding nanei pouve. Hinlah thilphabol jeh a gimbolna nathoh uva thohhattah a napanuva ahileh, Pathen nachunguva lunglhaiyah ahi.

Hijeh a chu Ama Pathen le mipite kikah a palaiya panga Pathen in athutep ho dinga tonsot'a alodingu chu akouho chun akisan theiyu ahitai. Ijeh ham itileh kitepna masaa chonset aboljeh'uva thiho chu lhatdoh dinga Christa chu hungthia ahitai.
Chuti ahileh aphai, Pathen in alungsetna kidangtah eichansahbe chehna dinguva ichonset jing dingu ham?
Phatchomna bei thusim seiho, ngolhoi thusei, alamlouva totnaho-hiche ho hi nangho hi na ahipoi. Chusangin, Pathen thangvahna sohjo hen.

Keima kadadoh a ahileh keiman sakol eng-dang khat kamui. Achunga Toupa chu Thina akiti, chule akilhonpi chu Lhankhuh ahi. Anilhona hi leiset chunga hoplia hopkhat chunga thuneina kipea, chemjama, kel'a le natnaa chule gamsa hang khut'a thitheina uma ahi.

Chutia chu, thutep hi tahsan jal'a kimu'ah ahin, manbei thilpeh-akipea chu ahi. Abraham tahsan tobang inei uva ahileh Mose Dan ijuiyu hihen, ijuilouvu hijongleh eihon ibon'uva imu teidiu ahi. Ajeh chu Abraham chu atahsan jousea dinga pa ahi.
Rome ten kachung thu akholun thina changei ding themmona ima amudoh lou jeh un lhadoh ding in eigong un ahi.
Hiti ahijeh chun, Pathen khotona chu Ama kigel lhah thuthu hiya ahi. Eihon ilhen theiju jong hilou, toh'a itohdoh theiju jong ahidehpoi.
Amaho phabep chun jon thanhoi aboljeh'uva mi sang somni le sangthum chu nikhat a athilo tobangu chun jonthanhoi bolpou hite.
Hinlah kasunga hin athunei chom khat aum'in, hichu kalungthim to kidouva ahi. Hiche thaneina hin keiya um chonset soh eihisah ahitai.

Hijehchun eihon Christa thudol thubul lam avel vel'a kihilna ngatau hite. Chusangin masotjou hitin hetna lam'ah pilhin ding gouhite. Tahbeh mongin eihon thilsebolnaa kona lunghei chule Pathen a itahsan nau ngaplhah thudol a thubul lam kithah pat kitna ingaicha tapouve.
Koiman amahi hutum le gihna neidauhen. Ama kaheng lama ahungkile tengleh na phattheinau pumin hinsol un. Amahi atahsan midangto ahung kilhon ding kakinemin ahi.
Kasopi deitahte, Nanghon katahsan aume tiuvin lang, hinla nachonnaa navetsah umhih taleh ipi phatchomna hin tem? Hitobang tahsanna chun koipen ahuhhing jou dem?
Hichun Jerusalem miho chu amaho leh amaho aki dong touvin, “Vaipo hon tha dinga agot jing'u chu hichepa hi hilou ham?
Hichun Pakai in aseijui ho chu ahu ahai khum in, “Lhagao theng kisan un.”
Ajeh chu amahon Pathen in miho chu Ama a dinga athemchan thudol hi ahethei pouve. Pathen tohgon chu amahon asan nomlou jeh uvin, amaho lung ngaito jui'a Pathen themchanna mu ding chu alunggon'u ahi.

Pathen Chapa tahsan jouse chun alung sunguva hiche hettohsahna hi adih ahi ti itahsanuve. Hiche tahsan lou ho chun Pathen chu ajouve tia aseiyu ahi, ajeh chu Pathen in Achapa thudol ahettohsah chu atahsan lou jeh u ahi.
Atahbeh a, keima eitahsan'a chun kathilbol chengse hi aman jong abol ding ahi; asanga lenjo jo abol ding ahi, chule keima Pa henga kinungle kit ding kahitai.
Sohho chun apakaihou thuphat jousea angai jing dingu chule ajochan uva alunglhaisah diu ahi. Amahon nelkal dauhen,
Pathen milungsetna changlel a naum louna dinguvin nangho khat le khat kivephauvin. Kihongphauvin koiman thinathei lunggitlou kengpumin nahinkho man suhboi dauhen, mitampi suhboh thei ahi.
Chujong leh, pam a miho seiphat changmi hiding ahi, achuti louleh miseiset achanna-a kon chun Diabol thangkolah ohkhaget inte.
Hiti chu hijongleh, Aman eiho khat cheh hi manbei thilpeh aguntah chu, Christa hongphalna jal in, eipecheh uvin ahi.
Chuphat in vantil nina chun asumlheng chu twikhanglen'a asunlhah'a ahileh, twi chu mithisa thisan tobang ahijenge. Chuin twikhanglen'a umjouse athigamtai.
Amaho chun navetvet pet bouva hilouvin, phat jousen lunglhaisah un. Christaa sohchang nahijal un, Pathen lunglam chu nalungpum piuvin bol un.

Hinlah hiche hi lungneng le jatheiyin bolin. Selepha nahetna chu thengin koiyin. Chua chu mihon nangho dounaa thu aseiyuva ahileh amahon Christa a nahijeh uva hinkho phatah naman chu amu tenguleh jahcha dingu ahi.
Ajeh chu hiche hi kapa lunglam ahi, Chapa mua chuleh tahsan jousen tonsot hinna anei ahitai; keiman amaho chu ni nunung nileh kakai thou ding ahi, ati.
Chuin mipi hon chutia asap pettah-u chun Herod in Pathen loupina peh sangin ama akiloupi sah tan ahile Pakai vantil in Herod chunga natna ahin lhunsah tan, chuti chun lungin anen athitan ahi.
I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa Pa henga chun vahchoina jouse umhen. Pathen chu mi khoto them le lhamonna jouse hungkon na Pa ahi.
Ahinlah mi phabep in alakhel gamtauvin, amaho chu hichehoa konin akihei mang gamun thilpha chomlou kihoulimna'ah akimangcha gam tauvin ahi.

Ajehchu, keima hiche Christa Kipana Thupha chung chang thua hin kajah achapoi. Hichea hi Pathen thahat in na atoh a, atahsan chan chu ahuhhing ahi; Judahte masa ding chule chidang namdangte jong hiding ahi.
Keihon abul kaphudohsau kalval koiman adang phut theilou ding ahiuve, hiche abul chu Jesu Christa ahi.
Hijeh a hi avela kasei ahi, pasal khat cheh in amatah akingailut tobanga ajinu chu angailut teiding ahi, chule jinu chun ajipa chu aja ding ahi.
Nachonset nau le chonsetnom naho chu paidoh a um ahiloulai jeh a nangho athia nanahiu ahi. Pathen in ichonsetnau angaidam tahjeh a Christa to eihin khomsah u ahitai.
Houbunga Pakai lhachaten nachunga khut angap uva nachungchang thua themgao thuphondoh naa kona Lhagao Thilpeh nachan chu nahsahmo hihbeh-in.
Chujouvin keiman Van thah le leithah kamui, ijeh inem itileh vanlui le leilui chu manga ahitai. Chule twikhanglen jong chu chemanga ahitai.
Phatseh in Kipah thanomun.
Chuchelai le chun mihon thina ahol dingu ahiala amujou lou dingu ahi. Amahon thina angaichat lheh dingu ahiala thina chu amahoa kona jammang ding ahitai!
Ijeh inem itileh Jesu chu athin, chule Ama chu ahingdoh kittai ti itahsan uva chule Jesu chu Ahungkile tengleh, Pathen in tahsansa ho chu Amatoh ahinlepui ding ahi ti itahsanu ahi.
Jesu hi Pathen Chapa ahi tia akama phongdoh ho chu asunguva Pathen chenga ahin, chule amaho Pathen a hinga ahiuve.
Nachonset luiyu chonna le masang nahinkhou thenlouna lungngaichat le doha lhahna chu pailhauvin.
Henge, keima kelngoi hongkot dihtah chu kahi, koi hileh keiya hunglut'a chu huhhing'a umding ahi; amaho chu nom tah'a lutle potle dingu, chuleh hamhing hoitah akimu dingu ahi.

Phabep chu songa aseplih un, phabepma thing atna ah akehso un, chule mi phabep chu chemjam a athat un ahi. Phabep jen chu kelngoivun le kelchavun kiahpumin, lhasam le engsetah in abol'un, chule abolseuvin ahi.
Eihon Christa chu chonpha ahi ti ihettah jeh uvin, koi hijongleh adih bola chu Pathen cha ahiuve tijong iheuve.
Ajeh chu Pathen in, ‘vannoi leiset pumpia huhhing na thupole dinga, chidang namdang te lah-a vah'a kasem lhon nahi,’ atia chu chidang namdang te lah a eisol lhon ahitai,” ati lhon e.

Keihon jachat um aguh a thilbol jouse le doha lheplhahna lungthim kapaiyun ahi. Keihon koima lheplhah ding kagopouve, ahilouleh Pathen Thuhi alam louvin kamangcha pouve. Keihon Pathen masangah thutah kaseiyun, chule hiche hi milungdih jousen aheuve.
Tun Ama vana Pathen khut jet lama choisangin aumin, athutepsa Lhagao Theng chu a-Pa a konin amun, hichu ahin bunglhan, tua namu'u najah-u hi ahi.
Nanghon nasempau nahet nau lungthim chu panun chule mithah chu kivonun chule Ama tobang hiuvin.

Hichu Pakai Jesun ajah chun hitin aseiyin, “Lazarus dammo nahi thina a kichai ding ahipoi, Pathen loupina dinga kibol'a ahibouve ati, hiche jeh a chu Pathen Chapa loupi na hungsoh doh dinga kitah lang joh ahi,” ati.

Hiche Kipana Thupha hin Pathen in amitmua iti chonpha eisemu ham ti eihiluve. Hiche hi akipat'a pat achaina gei tahsan jal ahi. Pathen thubun asei dung juiyin, “Tahsan vanga michonpha chun hinna anei ahi,” kitia ahi.
Hichun amahon Jesu chu akai'un, chuin a thingpel akiput'in Lugu mun (Hebrew paova Golgotha) atiu mun chu jonin achetan ahi.

Alungsetna'a Pathen in thilpeh jatchom chom cheh eipeh-u ahin, hichu phatah a iboltheina dingu ahi. Hijeh a chu Pathen in gao thusei theina napeh a ahileh, Pathen in napeh tahsan nanei dungjuiyin seijin.
Hiche Hinnanei li ho lah a a-khatna chu keipi tobang ahi; a-nina chu bongchal tobang ahi; a-thumna chun mihem mel apui; chule a-lina chu muvanlai lenpet tobang ahi.
Hijeh chun itobang hinkho mang nahiu chingtheiyun. Mingol ho tobang'in hinkho mang hih un, achingho tobang'in hing jouvin.
Hiche thudol a hin Judah mite le chidang namdang ho thakhat ahitai. Amahon Pakai khat aneikhom'un, Ama kou jouse chu lungsetna bulhingset apei.
Ajehchu Christa chun Danthu kipehlona ajehchu anasuh bulhitsa ahitai. Hiche jal'a chu Ama tahsan jouse chu Pathen themchanna asodoh ahitai.
Imacha lungolmona neihih un, chusangin, imalam jousea dingin taovun. Nangaichat chu Pathen henga seiyun, chule athilbol dohsaho jal in thangvahna peuvin.
Hichengse anasodoh hi eiho dinga kichihtheina ding ahi, hichehi amaho tobanga thilse ngaichatna ineilouna dingu ahije.
Aman hichu ahon a ahileh meilhum nasatah a kona hungpot tobang meikhu ahungdoh in, chule nisavah le hui chu meikhua konin avomsoh jengin ahi.
Hiche thudol ahin, Christian sopi khat chun ajinu engbolna ahilouleh dohabolna lamlouvin neihih un, ajeh chu khohtah amasanga kagihji nau bang chun Pakaiyin hitia chonseho chu alethuh ji.
Hiche hin Christian hunghi jouse chu mithah ahitauve tina ahi. Amaho chu abepbep hitalou ahitai, ajeh chu hinkho lui chu chemang ahitai. Hinkho thah kipan ahitai!
Ajehchu Pan chapa chu angailun, anatoh athilbol jouse avetsah in ahi. Chule tahbeh in Pa chun hiche mipa kisuhdam na sanga chungnungjo avetsah ding ahi, hichu nanghon kidang nasah cheh dingu ahi.
Gucha nahileh, guhchat ngajengin. Chusang chun, nakhutteni chu thilpha na hatohnan mangchan, chujouteng angaichaho chu hongphaltah in pen.
Chukal val'in, keima dingin lhunna ding indan neinagonpeh in, ajehchu Pathen in nataonaho asan a chule keima nahenga kahung vahjet kit ding kakineme.

Hijeh chun thuhil lamdang le gotchom'ah lunglut hih helun. Na thahatnau hi Pathen lungsetnaa hungkon ahibouvin, anneh thudola chonna hoa kon ahipoi, hiche thua kisalunggim hon ima phatchomna aneipouve.
Sopi deitah teho, Pakai natohnaa nalamkai hou chu jabolun. Amahon nalah uva atong gim'un, chule lhagao lama nakaihoijuva panga ahiuve.
Hichu anuleh apan Judah vaipo ho kichat na jeh'a achuti seilhon ahi, ajeh chu amahon, “Koi hileh Jesu chu Messiah ahi tia sei aum leh kikhop na in'a kon'a nomang ding tia ana phon dohsau ahitai.”
Ajeh iham itileh eiho Pathen lhagaova kon a Pathen hou cheptan tahbeh ihiuvin, Jesu Christa natoh chaisa a chu kingamdet'a, tahsalama kisonna neilou ihiuve.
Chule hiche hi Ama thupeh ho ahi: Eihon Achapa Jesu Christa itahsan uva chule Aman eithupeh banguva eiho khat le khat ikingailut dingu ahije.

Chujou chun keiman sahem chomdang khat leiset a kon ahung potdoh kamui. Ama chun kelngoi bang in ki ni aneiyin, ahin sahem masapa thuneina jouse chu amangchan; hinlah ama chun dragon tobang'in thu aseiye.
Sopi deitahteho, hicheho hetkhenna a hin chapang ngol bang hih un. Aselam ahipouva ahileh khohelou chapang tobang hiuvin, hinla hetkhen themna lampang thua pilhingtah hiuvin.
Nalah uva hahsatna thoh um'em? Natao jing diu ahiye. Chule thangvahna ding ajeh neihon Pakai chu avahchoi jing diu ahi.
Hiti ahijeh chun thacholsa nakhut'u chun tuhchah phakit henlang chule khup ngoisa ho chu thahatsah kit'un.

Chule geldoh uvin, natao nau Vana Pa chun koima lungset tum aneipoi. Aman natoh dung juiyuva nachung thu'u atan ding ahilouleh kipaman napeh dingu ahi. Hitia hi gamsunga kholjin nahi nauva hi Ama jana neiya nagin lhungkei dingu ahi.
Tua nangaichat u hi thohhat tohthoa lungdehat ahin, hiti hin Pathen lunglam chu boljomun. Chuteng Aman nateppeh jouseu namu dingu ahi.
Tahsan kiti hi ikinepnau khat atahbeh a hung sohding ahi tia lunggila kisonna ahi; hichun imulouvu thil hoa lungmonna eipeuvin ahi.
Pakai thuneina'a hiche hi kasei ahi: chidang namdangho bolngai bangin bol tahih un, ajeh chu amaho tah kinepna beiya lungnohphah bep ahiuve.
Hijehchun nangho naneh u ahiloule nadonu ahiloule nikho khat achoma nitloujeh ahiloule lhathah nikho nit ahilouleh choldo nikho thua koiman na-oimo dauhen.
“Hijeh a chu amaho hi Pathen Laltouna masanga dinguva olmo louva sun le jana Houin sunga chu kicholdo manlouva Pathen ajenu ahi. Chule Laltouna a toupa chun amaho aumna diu apeh ding ahi.”
Chuin Paul akumsuh in abungin akhut in hiche gollhang chapang pachu apomin, “lungdong hih un ahing nalaiye” ati.
Pathen in alhendoh ho dinga huhhingna le Christa a tonsot loupina ahinpohlut ding ahiphot le itobang thohgimna hijongleh thohding kanom in ahi.
Christian kingailutna chun khat in khat chibai kibohtouvin. Christa Jesua umho jouse cham-lungmonna in na umpiu hen.
Chule akalvalin, Christa jana jal in khat chu khat thua kitulut'un.
Hijeh chun sopi deitahte, phat lhin masanga kahin jih masat ahi. Kihong phauvin, hitia chu chuche migilou ho suhkhelna chun napui mang louna dinguvin chule nadindet pet u lhaso khaget uvinate.
Ji numeiho, Pakai mitmua dih ahina jal in najipa teu thunoiya kipelut un.
Adanghon kichatna aneitheina dingin achonseho chu mipi angsunga sosal'in.
Hijeh chun khat le khat ki-oimotona neitapou hite. Hisang chun tahsan kibahpi michomkhat kipalna le lhuhna neisah pouhite.
Hinlah thilpha bol ho jouse chunga chu loupina le jabolna chule cham-lungmonna chu Pathen'a kon'a hung ding ahi, Judah mite masan tin chule chidang namdang ho hiding ahi.
meikou achendaiyun, chemjam hema konin thinaa asohchauve. Athalhomnau chu thahatna asohdoh in ahi. Amaho galsatna a ahat un chule sepai jouse chu gal asatsah uve.
Tua pat'in koiman hiche thudol hoa hin eisuboi tahih hen. Ajeh iham itileh keiman katahsa chunga hi Jesua kahi vetsahna mahaho kaput ahitai.

Chujouchun vantil hattah khat chun songtum khat sumhei tebep alan, hichu twikhanglen'a alehlut in chuin ahinsamin, “Hiche tobang banga hi Babylon khopi chungnung chu hoisetah'a suhchim hung hiding chule kimukit talou ding ahitai,” ati.
Hinlah kagol ngaitahte, nangho natahsannau theng chungnung a chun khat le khat kisadoh un, Lhagao Theng thahatna achun taovun,

Nanghon tulai vannoi chonna le umchan khosahna ho jom hih-un, ahin Pathen'in mithah hina lungthah napeu henlang nalunggel ngaitonau khel hen. Chutengleh Pathen in nangho dinga apha le lunglhaina chule chamkimna nagonpeh-u chu nahin het ding'u ahi.
Ajehchu keima solchah ho jouse lah a imacha hiloupen kahi. Ahimongin Pathen houbung anagimbol hesoh a kahi jeh hin solchah tidinga jong kiloma kahipoi.
Hiche vannoi hi ngailu hih un ahilouleh vannoiyin napeh u jong ngailu hih un, ajeh chu nanghon vannoi nangailut tenguleh, nanghon Pa ngailutna chu nanei lou u ahi.

Nangman hitobang miho chu themmo chan theiya lom ahi nati; hinla nangma tah hitobang maa chu phalouva nahi, hichea hin them nachanna ding aumpoi. Nangman amaho agilou le gimbolna chang dinga lom ahiuve, natina a chu nangma tah kithemmo chan nahitai. Ajeh chu, nangma midang thutan'a panga chun hitobangma chu nabol'in ahi.

Hiti chun Jacob, Peter chule John hohi houbung khompiho tia kiheuva ahin, amaho chun keiya Pathen thilpeh kachan hi aheuvin, chule amahon Barnabas le keima jong atoh khompiuvin eisanguvin ahi. Amaho chun, amahon Judah nam mite ho lah a thu aseiphong banguva chidang namdang ho koma kaseiphong jom dingin eitilkhouvun ahi.

Chule Rome sepai hon Jesu akhetbeh uchun, aponsil alauvin, hal li asouvin sepai khat hal khat cheh in achang'un; chule asangkhol jong chu alauvin; asangkhol chu khuilou ahin, alua pat ato geiya kikhong lhungkei ahi.
Chuti ahileh midang hil'ah nangma, nangma tah kihil louva nahim? Nangman midang guhchat louding natia nangman naguhji ham?
Nasung uva chenga chule Pathen in nangho napeh u natahsau hi Pathen Lhagao Theng chenna Hou-In ahi ti heloubeh nahiu ham? Nangho nangho chang tuma nahi pouve.
Ahoichu hitaleh, Christa ngailutna chun eithunun u ahitai. Eihon Christa chu mijouse dinga thia ahitai ti itahsan uva ahileh, eima ho jong imilui uva chu thia ihitauve.

Chule hiti chun kasopi deitahte, Pathena nahitah jeh ule vana dinga kikou hoto chan neikhoma nahitah jeh uvin, kaphondoh u hiche Jesu keihon Pathen thupole Thempu chungnunga kaneiyu hi phatechan geilun.
